Restaurant: Tino, esto no es una pizzería
Review original: 新发现的宝藏餐厅！点外卖到家食物还很热，像刚从烤箱里拿出来。包装的设计也非常用心。一盒里面有四种不同口味，每一个口味都千差万别，又极具特色，最重要的是食材用的都特别新鲜。自制的柠檬汁也很好喝，我会推荐给我的朋友👍
Translated Review: Newly discovered treasure restaurant!The food at home is still very hot, just like it has just taken out of the oven.The design of the packaging is also very careful.There are four different flavors in a box. Each taste is very different and very distinctive. The most important thing is that the ingredients are particularly fresh.Homemade lemon juice is also very delicious, I will recommend it to my friends 👍

Restaurant: Tino, esto no es una pizzería
Review original: 在巴塞罗那这个能找到各种世界好吃的食物的地方，竟然有这种结合意大利披萨和Empanada的叫做tino的食品，外酥里柔，能感觉出食材非常新鲜，甜品也很赞。下单后很快就收到了，我们几个人都很喜欢吃，下次还会再来点其他的口味试试。
Translated Review: In Barcelona, a place that can find delicious foods in all kinds of worlds, there are even this kind of food called TINO combined with Italian pizza and Empanada. It can feel that the ingredients are very fresh and the desserts are very good.After placing an order, I received it quickly. A few of us liked to eat very much, and we will try some other flavors next time.

Review original: 地方就在附近，他们有美味的食物和优质的服务。希望很快会回来，附近没有很多优质的比萨。
Translated Review: The place is nearby, they have delicious food and high -quality services.I hope I will return soon, there are not many high -quality pizza nearby.

Review original: 真是一群可爱的人！在看外面的菜单时，主人的妻子立刻向我们致意，他们问我们是否对食物有任何疑问。我们与工作人员进行了几次热烈的对话，他们证明了他们为我们提供的正宗的意大利pina令人难忘。
Translated Review: Really a group of cute people!When watching the menu outside, the owner's wife immediately tried to us, and they asked us if we had any questions about food.We had a warm conversation with the staff, which proved that the authentic Italian PINA they provided us for us was unforgettable.

Review original: 店主是如此美好和快乐，披萨甚至更好，他说家庭是意大利，并建议尝试面食，但选择另一个比萨饼，因为第一个的味道。第二个突破了！试试这个地方
Translated Review: The owner is so beautiful and happy, pizza is even better. He said that the family is Italy and suggested to try pasta, but choose another Bisa cake because of the first taste.The second breakthrough!Try this place

Review original:
您收到的服务非常好，非常友好，对他的食物和饮料充满热情。
我们有一个披萨分享，这是令人难以置信的。会推荐给大家。我们会回来的
Translated Review:
The services you receive are very good, very friendly, and passionate about his food and drinks.
We have a pizza sharing, which is incredible.I will recommend it to everyone.We will come back

Review original:
Hola la comida时代muy bien。 La pizza era perfecto y el cafe es maravilloso。 Somos es grupos de siete y disfrutamos Las comida。
服务很棒，经营餐厅的夫妇非常好。

我们会再来这里
Translated Review:
Hola La Comida era Muy Bien.La Pizza Era Perfecto Y El Cafe ES Maravilloso.Somos ES GRUPOS de Siete Y Disfrutamos Las Comida.
The service is great, and the couple running the restaurant is very good.

We will come here again

Review original: 由一对可爱的意大利夫妇Alessio和Carol经营。非常友好的服务，美味的食物，尤其是比萨罗马和城里最好的意大利咖啡！他们也有很棒的啤酒选择。如果你在该地区肯定检查这个地方！
Translated Review: It is run by a cute Italian couple Alessio and Carol.Very friendly service, delicious food, especially the best Italian coffee in Bisar Rome and the city!They also have great beer choices.If you are sure to check this place in the area!

Review original: 餐厅的氛围让人感觉很放松。预定了7点开餐，我们是第一桌，老板亲切地介绍了菜单和酒，白葡萄酒的选择让人对菜品有了更高的期待。果然，随后的每一道菜都充满了惊艳，美食带给人的兴奋感持续了整个用餐过程。这是我们第四次来到巴塞罗那，但却是第一次体验到巴塞罗那美食的精致感。现在已经迫不及待开始期待下一次去巴塞罗那了！
Translated Review: The atmosphere of the restaurant makes people feel very relaxed.After booking at 7 o'clock, we were the first table. The boss introduced the menu and wine cordially. The choice of white wine made people look forward to the dishes.Sure enough, every dish was full of stunning, and the excitement brought by the food continued the entire dining process.This is the fourth time we have come to Barcelona, but it is the first time that I experienced Barcelona's delicateness.I can't wait to start going to Barcelona next time!
Into

Review original: 我们在这家餐馆的配对菜单上点了食物。食物的味道真是太棒了！我们一行共有4对夫妇，他们还为素食者提供了美味的替代品。从开胃菜到甜点，我们点的食物被精美地摆放在独特的盘子里，这增加了我们用餐的感觉。即使我们的餐桌旁坐了8个人，在这家餐馆也令我们感到很亲密。何塞和塞布丽娜对每道菜的介绍和展示是我们晚上用餐最精彩的部分。如果你想寻找一个完美的夜晚，这家餐馆就是你要去的地方！更多
Translated Review: We ordered food on the pairing menu of this restaurant.The taste of food is really great!We have a total of 4 couples, and they also provide delicious alternatives for vegetarians.From appetizing dishes to desserts, the food we ordered was placed on a unique plate, which increased the feeling of our meals.Even if there are 8 people sitting next to our table, we feel very close in this restaurant.The introduction and display of each dish for each dish is the most exciting part of our dining at night.If you want to find a perfect night, this restaurant is where you are going!More

Review original: 我们非常享受在康格拉西亚的这段经历。我们点了这里的“惊喜”品尝菜单，每一道菜都很美味。而且更棒的是，这里的酒也很好，服务也很有用心和专业。我们强烈推荐这家店，我们肯定还会再来的。
Translated Review: We enjoy this experience in Congracia.We ordered the "surprise" to taste the menu here, and each dish was delicious.And even better, the wine here is also very good, the service is also very intentional and professional.We strongly recommend this shop, we will definitely come again.

Review original: 我喜欢巴塞罗那，并且有幸在过去的三年里的7月份参观了这座城市，这家餐厅在我们的访问时始终是必做之事。独特的食物，葡萄酒和服务。大爱这里。极力推荐！更多
Translated Review: I like Barcelona, and I am fortunate to visit the city in July in the past three years. This restaurant has always been a must -do when our visit.Unique food, wine and service.Love here.Recommended strongly!More

Review original: 这是与我们的4名DESY烹饪俱乐部成员一起度过的超级晚餐之夜。整个‘惊喜’菜单都特别棒，但葡萄酒令我们惊叹！这不是普通的葡萄酒，而是精心挑选的特殊葡萄酒，能与精致的菜肴完美匹配。我们在凌晨1时30分结束了我们的夜晚，工作人员非常细心地详细介绍了我们点的菜。若您想品尝精彩的巴尔科洛纳美食，强烈推荐这里！更多
Translated Review: This is a super dinner night with the four members of our Desy Cooking Club.The whole 'surprise' menu is particularly great, but the wine surprises us!This is not an ordinary wine, but a carefully selected special wine that can perfectly match the exquisite dishes.We ended our night at 1:30 in the morning, and the staff introduced the dishes we ordered in detail.If you want to taste the wonderful Balcolona food, it is highly recommended here!More

Review original: 更多
Translated Review: More

Review original: 我们上次去巴塞罗那旅行时在这家餐厅吃了饭，顿时爱上了这里。这次忍不住又去了一次。这家小餐馆有两个前台工作人员，他们把我们照顾得很好。我们尝试了传统套餐菜单，发现所有的菜吃起来都很有意思，味道也很好。（我们在其他地方尝试过创新菜，味道融合得不是很好）如果我们有幸再来巴塞罗那一次的话，一定会再来这家小小的宝藏餐厅的。另外，如果你喜欢辣味，试试他们的姜汁软饮，非常好喝！哦……西班牙餐厅一般会在晚上8点以后才开始晚餐。我们来自不同的时区，所以这家晚上7点就开门的餐厅正合我们的意思。
Translated Review: When we went to Barcelona last time, we had a meal in this restaurant and fell in love with it.I couldn't help but go again.There are two front desk staff in this small restaurant, which takes us well.We tried the traditional set menu and found that all the dishes were interesting and the taste was good.(We have tried innovative dishes elsewhere elsewhere, and the taste is not very good.) If we are fortunate to come to Barcelona once again, we will definitely come to this small treasure restaurant.In addition, if you like spicy flavor, try their ginger juice soft drink, it is very delicious!Oh ... Spanish restaurants usually start dinner after 8 pm.We come from different time zones, so the restaurant that opened the door at 7 pm is what we mean.

Review original: 距离我们上次去Con Gracia已经三年了，我希望接下来的三年内我还会来这里。何塞和塞布丽娜非常棒-他们热情欢迎我们，而且知识渊博，健谈，慷慨，经营一个很棒的餐厅。食物和葡萄酒都是一流的，她们会给我们介绍细节。我们又一次体验了盲品菜单，每一个方面都是一种享受。来吧，随遇而安
Translated Review: It has been three years since we went to CON Gracia last time. I hope I will come here in the next three years.Hese and Cybrina are great-they welcomes us enthusiastically, and they are knowledgeable, talkative, generous, and operate a great restaurant.Food and wine are first -class, and they will introduce us details.We once again experienced the blind menu, each aspect is a kind of enjoyment.Come on, follow the encounter

Review original: Con Gracia餐厅给人一种独特的用餐经历，由主厨来决定菜单。每道菜都是精心制作的，既好看又好吃。我们没有像6年前在那儿吃饭时一样感到失望——它仍像我们记忆中那样令人难忘！服务也非常完美——这有助于提升整体的愉快用餐体验。
Translated Review: The Con Gracia restaurant gives a unique dining experience, and the chef decides the menu.Each dish is carefully made, both beautiful and delicious.We were not as disappointed as when eating there 6 years -it is still as memorable as we remember!The service is also perfect -this helps improve the overall pleasant dining experience.

Review original: 餐厅很吸引人，很现代。我们刚一进门，服务就很到位，而且很友好。他们拿走了我们的外套，让我们马上入座。给我们递来饮料单和菜单。我们选择了葡萄酒搭配的体验菜单。我们的菜上得很快，选的酒和食物搭配得很好。两位服务员都非常友好和专业，对每道菜和相应的葡萄酒都有很好的介绍。菜的一个亮点是加入了口感清新、独特的可食用花，为我们提供了多维的味觉享受。总的来说，这是一次令人难以置信的体验，食物美味，服务周到。
Translated Review: The restaurant is very attractive and modern.As soon as we entered the door, the service was in place and very friendly.They took our coat and let us take the seat immediately.Give us a drink list and menu.We chose the experience menu with wine.Our dishes are very fast, and the selected wine and food are well matched.The two waiters are very friendly and professional, and they have a good introduction to each dish and corresponding wine.One of the highlights of the dish is that the fresh and unique edible flowers are added to provide us with a multi -dimensional taste enjoyment.In general, this is an incredible experience, delicious food and thoughtful service.

Review original: 食物超棒，两位主人的服务也十分周到。我们是盲选的，由主厨决定菜单，另外还加了红酒，跟食物非常相配。菜都非常好吃，每道菜都有详细的解释，好让我们知道吃/喝的是什么。之前试过尝鲜菜单，但还从来没有试过盲选，还真没让我们失望。美味的食物、暖心的老板、精心的准备，给人十分独特之感，让人觉得备受欢迎。最棒的要数鳕鱼肉了，文火烤猪肉、薄荷和电花甜点也超棒。如果在巴塞罗那的话千万不要错过。一定要先预定，因为这里真的挺小的（大概只有24个座位）。
Translated Review: The food is great, and the service of the two owners is also very thoughtful.We were blindly selected. The chef decided the menu, and red wine was added, which was very matched with food.The dishes are very delicious, and each dish has a detailed explanation, so that we can know what to eat/drink.I tried the early adopters before, but I never tried blind selection, and I really didn't let us down.The delicious food, the warm -hearted boss, and the careful preparations give people a very unique sense and make people feel very popular.The best is the cod meat, and the roasted pork, mint and electroext desserts are also great.Don't miss it if you are in Barcelona.Be sure to book it first, because it is really small here (about only 24 seats).
Into

Review original: 我们尝试了“体验”菜单，真是太棒了。 真的很好。 “电花”是亮点之一（我不会说更多去破坏你的体验:)。 服务员真的很有趣，让你有宾至如归的感觉。
Translated Review: We tried the "experience" menu, which was great.really good."Electric" is one of the highlights (I won't say more to destroy your experience :).The waiter is really interesting, so that you feel like a guest.

Review original: 我在这家特别的餐馆有一次很棒的晚餐体验。这里有两个店主，他们两个人对自己的工作都非常有热情，能让你在这家餐馆有很棒的体验。他们一开始就会给你讲解每一道菜的细节，这也是为什么这里的每一道菜色香味俱全，而且所有的食物食材都是很高级的。你一定要来这家餐馆试试。
Translated Review: I have a great dinner experience in this special restaurant.There are two shopkeepers here. The two of them are very enthusiastic about their work, allowing you to have a great experience in this restaurant.From the beginning, they will explain the details of each dish. This is why every dish here is full of fragrance, and all food ingredients are very advanced.You must come to this restaurant to try.

Review original: 我们在这里度过了美好的夜晚。那里有2个菜单：一个传统的，一个惊喜的（厨师根据喜好或过敏情况选择菜单）。我们选了惊喜菜单，是一个非常好的选择。一切都很美味，工作人员非常好。他们解释了一切都是如何准备的，他们专业而且富有幽默感。非常感谢！我们吃到了一顿很棒的晚餐。
Translated Review: We have a good night here.There are two menus there: a traditional, a surprise (the chef chooses the menu according to preferences or allergies).We chose the surprise menu, which is a very good choice.Everything is delicious and the staff is very good.They explained how everything was prepared, and they were professional and humorous.Thank you so much!We had a great dinner.

Review original: 在猫途鹰上看了大家对这间餐厅的评价后过来的，并没有让我们失望。这是间很舒适的餐厅，气氛很好，食物超级美味。尝试了品尝菜单，每道菜都很棒，餐桌服务也是一流的，所有工作人员都很热情温暖。这是间不可错过的餐厅!!
Translated Review: After watching the evaluation of this restaurant on the Cathawk, we did not disappoint us.This is a very comfortable restaurant. The atmosphere is very good and the food is super delicious.I tried to taste the menu. Each dish was great, and the table service was first -class. All staff were very enthusiastic and warm.This is a restaurant that must be missed !!

Review original: Sabrina和Jose真的很努力为我们带来了非常美好的体验。餐馆很小，可能只有10/12张餐桌，所以感觉很亲密，但间隔不是很近。我们选择传统品尝菜单，并且点了一瓶很不错的葡萄酒。这顿饭花了三个小时，所以做好准备，但真的很好。我不喜欢给食物拍照片，但这一次我不得不这么做。总的来说，这是一次美好的用餐体验。用餐中，我的妻子问是否有什么可以让我们记下每道菜。Sabrina将所有细节亲手记录在了他们的一份菜单上面！
Translated Review: Sabrina and Jose really worked hard to bring us a very beautiful experience.The restaurant is very small, maybe only 10/12 tables, so it feels very close, but the interval is not very close.We chose the traditional tasting menu and ordered a bottle of good wine.This meal took three hours, so I was ready, but it was really good.I don't like to take pictures of food, but this time I have to do so.In general, this is a good dining experience.During the meal, my wife asked if there was anything to let us write down every dish.Sabrina recorded all the details on one of their menus!

Review original: 我和我的丈夫选择了葡萄酒搭配的“体验”，每道菜都让我们眼花缭乱，享受着令人惊艳的味道。这个小专业团队给我们留下了深刻的印象，这是我们在西班牙停留的完美方式。强烈推荐你来体验——你不会失望的!
Translated Review: My husband and I chose the "experience" of wine with wine. Every dish made us dazzled and enjoyed a stunning taste.This small professional team left us a deep impression, which is the perfect way we stay in Spain.I strongly recommend you to experience -you won't be disappointed!

Review original: 我们最近在巴塞罗那去了Con Gràcia餐厅。到目前为止，这里一直是我们最喜欢吃晚餐的地方之一。服务完美，友好，热情，非常了解菜单上的食物和酒。菜单本身是选择两个品尝菜单之一。一个是传统的菜式，一个是惊喜菜式。我们选择了惊喜菜式，留下了深刻的印象，很棒的口味，烹饪技术很棒，最重要的是，美味！作为一个比较，我们很幸运地在巴塞罗那去了一家米其林三星餐厅，但在任何时候我们都会在Con Garcia餐厅选择吃晚餐。
Translated Review: We recently went to the Con Gràcia restaurant in Barcelona.So far, this has always been one of our favorite places to eat dinner.The service is perfect, friendly, enthusiastic, and knows the food and wine on the menu very well.The menu itself is one of the two tasting menus.One is a traditional dish, and the other is a surprise dish.We chose a surprise dish, which was impressed by it. It was great, and the cooking skills were great. The most important thing is that it is delicious!As a comparison, we were lucky to go to a Michelin Samsung restaurant in Barcelona, but at any time we would choose dinner at the Con Garcia restaurant.

Review original: 品尝南美小吃和精心制作的鸡尾酒的绝佳去处。有很棒的比萨可供挑选。舒服、休闲的氛围。店主/经营者很友好，让我们一次又一次地回来吃点心和聊天。基尔特罗是一个很好的地方去开始或结束你的夜晚，也可以过来这里享受美味的食物。更多
Translated Review: Taste of South American snacks and elaborate cocktails.A great pizza is available.A comfortable, casual atmosphere.The owner/operator is very friendly, let us come back to eat snacks and chat again and again.Kiltro is a good place to start or end your night, and you can also come here to enjoy delicious food.More

Review original: 巴塞罗那最好的Michelada。非常好的鸡尾酒和食物。我和一些朋友一起去了Kiltro Bar，将再次回来！更多
Translated Review: Barcelona's best Michelada.Very good cocktail and food.I went to Kiltro Bar with some friends, and I will come back again!More

Review original: 该死的食物是死的。您将在这里物有所值，并得到业主弗朗西斯和他可爱的员工的超级服务。我们会一次又一次地回来。喜欢这个地方和食物。更多
Translated Review: Damn food is dead.You will be worthwhile here and get the super service of the owner Francis and his cute employees.We will come back again and again.Like this place and food.More

Review original: 伟大的皮斯科和伟大的变异。正宗的拉丁美洲氛围。如果您想品尝精美的鸡尾酒和真正的拉丁文化，一定要在Gr cia停留。更多
Translated Review: Great Pisco and great mutation.Authentic Latin America atmosphere.If you want to taste exquisite cocktails and real Latin culture, you must stay in GR CIA.More

Review original: 这里的食物很棒！他们提供传统的拉丁美洲美食。我们吃了那些炸香蕉薯片，玉米片，玉米饼，蛋糕和一些鸡尾酒，我可以推荐所有这些。工作人员也很好。下次当我在巴塞罗那时，我肯定会去哪里更多
Translated Review: The food here is great!They provide traditional Latin American food.We ate those fried banana potato chips, corn slices, corn cakes, cakes and cocktails. I can recommend all these.The staff is also very good.When I am in Barcelona next time, I will definitely go more

Review original: 在返回Airbnb的路上偶然发现了这个酒吧，最终成为我们整个行程中的“前往”酒吧。很棒的氛围，酒保弗朗西斯很棒。喝他推荐的任何东西。你不会失望的！更多
Translated Review: The bar accidentally discovered on the way back to Airbnb, and eventually became the "head" bar in our entire itinerary.A great atmosphere, Bao Bao Francis is great.Drink anything he recommended.You will not be disappointed!More

Review original: 招牌手工鸡尾酒，震撼人心！弗朗西斯是我们在巴塞罗那最好的调酒师，不要错过这些潮湿的饮料！更多
Translated Review: The signboard handmade cocktail is shocking!Francis is the best bartender in Barcelona, don't miss these humid drinks!More

Review original: 我们的十人小组在他们关闭之前偶然发现了这个地方。弗朗西斯（我们的调酒师）不仅张开双臂欢迎我们，而且还提供了我们生活中曾经拥有的最好的工艺和融合的鸡尾酒。这是来自两位调酒师。如果你跳过这个地方，你搞砸了。它的氛围，温暖，活力和热情好客是我们所需要的一切，而且更多。谢谢KILTRO如果我们住在这里你肯定会有一些常客？更多
Translated Review: Our ten -person group accidentally discovered this place before they closed.Francis (our bartender) not only welcomes us with open arms, but also provides the best craftsmanship and coordinating cocktails that we once had in our lives.This is from two bartender.If you skip this place, you messed up.Its atmosphere, warmth, vitality and enthusiastic hospitality are everything we need, and more.Thank you Kiltro, if we live here, you will definitely have some regular customers?More

Review original: 在访问巴塞罗那10次之后，在这个神奇的城市预订我们的婚礼之旅时，我们偶然发现了我们去过的最好的鸡尾酒吧。我有Gin Mediterraneo，这是不真实的。工作人员对所有不同的鸡尾酒都非常了解，而且友好。肯定会再次来到这里。 X更多

Review original: 和几个朋友一起去了那里。伟大的鸡尾酒（伟大的我意味着伟大的）。我们有玉米片和肉馅卷饼，它们非常好吃且很好。凉爽的氛围和氛围。如果你在附近，你应该试一试！更多
Translated Review: Go there with a few friends.Great cocktails (great I mean great).We have corn slices and meat stuffed cakes. They are very delicious and good.The cool atmosphere and atmosphere.If you are nearby, you should try it!More

Review original:
在Instagram上看到一些促销和戏弄，出于好奇，决定和一些朋友去那里开放。首先要告诉你的是我们和我的朋友们都不会给我们留下深刻的印象，因为我们在不同的地方闲逛并经常旅行，但是让我告诉你，自从我们进入Resto以来，Kiltro团队一直在吹头 - 酒吧首先，我对名字感到好奇，酒吧背后的魔术师弗朗西斯为我们画上了清晰的画面，对我们来说真的很有意义。
然后我们在酒吧座位。这位先生Luis Felipe向我们推荐了一款神话般的新鲜鸡尾酒，我们立刻被迷住了。
厨师安德烈斯非常想到食物菜单，我们尝试了必须的菜肴，而不是立刻我们感到失望，即使是那里的匆忙，食物出来的速度相当快，有一个壮观的演示，没有任何妥协那味道。
伙计们对Kiltro团队大加赞赏。
大男孩在镇上。 ？更多

I saw some promotions and teasing on Instagram. Out of curiosity, I decided to go there with some friends.The first thing to tell you is that we and my friends will not impress us, because we stroll around and travel frequently in different places, but let me tell you that since we entered RESTO, the KILTRO team has beenBlowing-First, I am curious about the name. The magician behind the bar Draw Crancis draws a clear picture for us, which is really meaningful for us.
Then we sit in the bar.The gentleman Luis Felipe recommended us a mythical fresh cocktail, and we were immediately fascinated.
The chef Andreis thought of the food menu very much. We tried the necessary dishes, instead of being disappointed immediately. Even in a hurry there, the food was quite fast. There was a spectacular demonstration without any compromise.
The gangs praised the Kiltro team.
The big boy is in the town.IntersectionMore

Review original:
平平无奇的夜晚聚集了四个饥饿的肉食者。
真的，太！好吃了！
服务员推荐了肉眼但是我们人比较多，就点了1kg的肉拼盘
个人感觉香肠No.1肉汁在嘴里爆开，其次是牛仔骨，太香了，血肠也很好吃，牛排烘烤的味道也无法忘记，酱汁也非常好吃！解腻还胃口大开！绿色的那个酱汁真的强推！
以后想吃肉绝对会再来，太满足了！
最后谢谢LYN~服务也超级好，推荐的辣酱也不错！

Four hungry carnivors gathered in the same night.
Really, too!It's delicious!
The waiter recommends the naked eye, but there are more people, so we ordered 1kg of meat platter
Personally feel that the sausage NO.1 gravy burst into the mouth, followed by denim bone, which is too fragrant, the blood sausage is also delicious, the taste of steak baking can not be forgotten, and the sauce is very delicious!Jieling and appetite!The green sauce is really strong!
If you want to eat meat in the future, you will definitely come again, too satisfying!
Finally, thank you Lyn ~ The service is also super good, and the recommended hot sauce is also good!

Review original: 我在巴塞罗那呆了一周，去了这家了不起的餐厅两次！食物很棒，但是还有其他更好的东西。 。 。他的名字叫Aitor，他是一个可爱的服务生，他非常有趣，并免费为我们带来了东西！ ！我们不能专心听他在说什么，因为他很烫！ ！ ！最后，我们自欺欺人，但无论如何晚上好！ PS：Aitor，如果您对这种奇怪的行为感到抱歉，我们仍然爱您并关心您！顺便说一句，我为我的牙齿之间的食物感到遗憾！反正一切都好吃

Review original: 惊人！ ！去喝一杯，但后来又住了几杯。我真的很喜欢酒吧的风格和装饰。鸡尾酒很棒，友好的酒吧老板确实让我们度过了一个愉快的夜晚。您可以看到他知道自己在做什么，并且总是问一切是否还好。他还给了我们有关不同瓶子的信息，对此我非常感谢。真的会推荐在巴塞罗那的时候更多

Review original: 文华东方酒店的礼宾人员提出此建议，是在酒店附近选择价格更合理的选择。工作人员很友好，食物选择多种多样。质量非常好。
Translated Review: The courtesy of the Wenhua Oriental Hotel made this suggestion to choose a more reasonable choice near the hotel.The staff is very friendly and has a variety of food choices.The quality is very good.

Review original: 说食物很好，服务是轻描淡写！ ！绝对喜欢这个地方，他们用最优质的产品制成的特殊盘子使其成为我的最爱之一！晚餐或午餐后的鸡尾酒是巴塞罗那最好的鸡尾酒之一。我还必须特别提及工作人员，因为他们是出色的主持人，让您有家的感觉。 Balula敬业精神！更多
Translated Review: Say that the food is good, the service is lightly described!IntersectionI definitely like this place. The special plates made with the best products make it one of my favorite!The cocktails after dinner or lunch are one of the best cocktails in Barcelona.I also have to mention the staff in particular, because they are excellent hosts and make you feel at home.Balula's professionalism!More

Review original: Babula酒吧是一个真正隐藏的宝石！酒吧的设计注重细节。现代而时尚的室内设计结合了非常好的鸡尾酒（自己的收藏品，还有极好的经典菜肴，如踢屁股Negroni或非常好的美式菜肴）和美味的食物 - 小吃配上现代风味。例如，带有拉猪肉和松露的芝士奶酪和鳄梨酱的玉米片和其他所有菜肴一样美味。我强烈推荐这个地方 - 如果您正在寻找巴塞罗那的优质和现代体验。毫无疑问，这是值得的！谢谢Leo的热情好客！更多
Translated Review: Babula bar is a truly hidden gem!The design of the bar pays attention to details.Modern and stylish interior design combines very good cocktails (their own collections, as well as excellent classic dishes, such as kicking buttocks Negroni or very good American dishes) and delicious food -snacks with modern flavor.For example, cheese cheese cheese with pork and truffles and the corn slices of avocado sauce are as delicious as all other dishes.I strongly recommend this place -if you are looking for Barcelona's high -quality and modern experience.There is no doubt that this is worth it!Thank you Leo for your enthusiastic hospitality!More

Review original:
来到里尔克的一顿糟糕的晚餐，来这里舔我们的伤口。

凉爽的氛围和美味的饮料。迭戈太棒了。更多
Translated Review:
Come to a bad dinner in Rilke and come here to lick our wounds.

The cool atmosphere and delicious drinks.Diego is great.More

Review original: 我们在回到C Pau Claris酒店的路上打电话给现代装饰所吸引，幸运的是食物与装饰相得益彰。我们享受了一个令人愉快的晚餐，由酒吧经理Nico照顾得很好。一群看起来像公司集团的嘈杂的团体很快就从酒吧搬到了他们的桌子旁，让我们在桌子上安静了两下。如果我没有弄错的话，厨师似乎已经在食物中引入了东西味道，将切碎的胡萝卜沙拉变成了芝麻油调味品。这是在我切成薄片的金枪鱼切片之上，这是我每天都可以吃的菜。我们还有burrata奶酪，丰富而奶油，带有轻微的香醋香醋。番茄吐司不是我们所期待的，但是芥末酱的沙拉比它更能弥补。整个晚上非常愉快。更多
Translated Review: We called the modern decoration on the way back to the CP PAU Claris Hotel. Fortunately, food and decoration complement each other.We enjoyed a pleasant dinner, and the bar manager NICO took good care of it.A group of noisy groups who looked like the company group soon moved from the bar to their desk, allowing us to be quiet at the table twice.If I did not make mistakes, the chef seems to have introduced things in the food, turning the chopped carrot salad into sesame oil condiments.This is the tuna cut into a piece of tuna, which is a dish I can eat every day.We also have Burrata cheese, rich and creamy, with a slight vinegar vinegar.Tomato toast is not what we expect, but the salad of mustard sauce can make up better than it.It was very happy all night.More

Review original: 我们碰巧经过Babula酒吧，然后回到酒店。在大气和装饰的氛围中，我们被Neko难以置信的饮料，服务和友善所震撼。 。 。如果您喜欢调酒和特殊饮品，强烈推荐。更多
Translated Review: We happened to pass the Babula bar and then returned to the hotel.In the atmosphere of atmosphere and decoration, we are shocked by NEKO's incredible drinks, services and friendship.EssenceEssenceIf you like bartending and special drinks, it is highly recommended.More

Review original: 我们碰巧偶然通过Babula，同时入住Passaig de Gracia，并享受有趣的装饰和舒适的氛围。芥末酱和腌三文鱼的绿色沙拉很美味，我们很享受女主人推荐的熏陶三明治！主人是迷人的和推荐的超级葡萄酒 - 所有这些都是合理的价格。我们在第二天过去时回来了。更多

We enjoy the sampled sandwich recommended by the hostess!The owner is charming and recommended super wine -all these are reasonable prices.We came back the next day.More

Review original: 我们来这家餐厅作为一个五口之家，两次在我们居住期间，在巴塞罗那，一次吃早餐，一次一个晚上。 早餐我们吃了各种各样的东西，从全套的英式熟食早餐到糕点。 在晚上，我们吃了素食西班牙海鲜饭，都是素食主义者，肉食汉堡。 这里的服务很好，女服务员很友好，效率很高。
Translated Review: We came to this restaurant as a five -mouth home. During our lives, in our lives, in Barcelona, one breakfast at a time, one night at a time.Breakfast we ate a variety of things, from a full set of British cooked breakfast to cakes.In the evening, we ate a vegetarian Spanish seafood rice, all of which are vegetarians and meat burgers.The service here is very good, the female waiters are friendly and efficient.

Review original: 这是我们第一次在巴塞罗那的几天有待改进的食品部。 然后我们吃了晚餐，普拉多·弗洛雷斯和我们的不见了几乎每天都回去了。 这家休闲餐厅有很棒的食物，非常友好的员工，位置很方便，就在兰布拉大道上 (La Rambla) 。 我强烈推荐这家酒店。
Translated Review: This is the first time we have to be improved in Barcelona to be improved.Then we had dinner, and Prado Florez and us gone back almost every day.This casual restaurant has great food, very friendly employees, and is very convenient, just on La Rambla.I strongly recommend this hotel.

Review original:
我们来到了这家神话般的餐厅，游览巴塞罗那。 最棒的发现！
菜单上有很棒的选择，食物是极好的。 我们点了西班牙杂烩菜饭，因为它是煮熟的新鲜的有一个 30 分钟等了大概，但等待是值得的。 慷慨的分量，不错的服务，友好和高效的。 我们还会再来巴塞罗那的，亦会向未来的这家餐厅。
Translated Review:
We came to this mythical restaurant to visit Barcelona.The best discovery!
There is a great choice on the menu, and the food is excellent.We ordered Spanish hodgepodes because it was cooked and fresh for 30 minutes, but waiting was worth it.Generous weight, good service, friendly and efficient.We will come to Barcelona again, and we will also go to the future restaurant.

Review original: 这是我第一次来这里，不得不说我感到很惊喜。非常好的食物和服务，强烈推荐。芒果奶昔很好吃，咖喱也很好吃。
Translated Review: This is the first time I have come here and I have to say that I am surprised.Very good food and services, highly recommended.The mango milkshake is delicious, and the curry is also delicious.

Review original: 我在印度住得够久了，我有很多印度朋友。在斯瓦塔姆饭店吃过饭之后，发现他们确实证明了食物是正宗的!内饰很平和，但他们的食物却很辣。你应该试试他们的咖喱鸡块、坦肚喱鸡还有青豆芝士。
Translated Review: I have lived in India for a long time, and I have many Indian friends.After eating at the Swam Hotel, they found that they did prove that food is authentic! The interior is very peaceful, but their food is very spicy.You should try their curry chicken nuggets, tanna chicken and green bean cheese.

Review original: 不要期待会有很好的气氛，但食物肯定使它值得去！Saag Paneer是我吃过的最好的，鸡肉也很棒，当然你必须要点一下羔羊Tikka。这里有非常友好的工作人员，他们会让你笑起来，很好的服务于你。不要被从外面看到的墙上的“孔洞”吓跑！进去享受吧！
Translated Review: Don't expect a good atmosphere, but food will definitely make it worth going!Saag Paner is the best I have ever eaten, and chicken is also great. Of course, you have to order the lamb Tikka.There are very friendly staff here, they will make you laugh and serve you well.Don't be scared away by the "hole" on the wall seen from the outside!Go in and enjoy!

Review original: 我是一个印度人，我花了很长时间（两个星期)找到印度食物，并且我极度渴望尝试周边的一些东西，接着发现了这个地方——舒适的氛围，友善的主人，得体的食物，不错的菜单，菜单也有很多的不同，最不错的还是这里的热情好客。
Translated Review: I am an Indian. I spent a long time (two weeks) to find Indian food, and I was extremely eager to try something around me, and then discovered this place -a comfortable atmosphere, friendly owner, decent food,A good menu, the menu is also different, the most good is the enthusiastic hospitality here.

Review original: 这里的食物很不错，店主很热情。对于完美的一餐，你还有何奢求呢？这里的品质很不错，印度应该以这个餐厅为荣。我们点了薄脆饼作为开胃菜，带有3种酸辣酱。每种酸辣酱都很不错。我们吃的是素食，吃了蔬菜热咖喱，还喝了印度dal汤,这些菜都是店家自制的，味道不错。混合酸奶沙拉味道也很棒。印度面饼很热乎，很酥脆，对于想在巴塞罗那吃到印度食物的游客来说，我极力推荐这里。店主面带微笑，让我们拥有了愉悦的就餐体验。餐馆距离我们住的酒店有点远，但在这里吃过饭后，我会说，这里值得一来。餐馆的装饰很简单，很干净，氛围很不错。在这里就餐吧，你一定会有难忘的体验。
Translated Review: The food here is very good, and the owner is very enthusiastic.What else do you have for a perfect meal?The quality here is very good, India should take this restaurant as a pride.We ordered the brittle pie as an appetizer with 3 kinds of spicy sauce.Each kind of hot and sour sauce is very good.We eat vegetarian food, eat vegetable hot curry, and drink Indian DAL soup. These dishes are self -made of stores and taste good.Mixed yogurt salad taste is also great.Indian noodle cakes are very hot and crispy. For tourists who want to eat Indian food in Barcelona, I highly recommend this.The owner smiled, so that we had a pleasant dining experience.The restaurant is a bit far from the hotel we live in, but after eating here, I will say that it is worthwhile here.The decoration of the restaurant is very simple, clean, and the atmosphere is very good.Dinner here, you must have an unforgettable experience.

Review original: 真的很可爱的食物和服务。我们分享了一些素食盘子，samosas和naan，一切都很好吃！
Translated Review: Really cute food and services.We share some vegetarian plates, Samosas and Naan, everything is delicious!

Review original: 在巴塞罗那住了5晚，参观了这家餐厅3次！食物是正宗的印度菜。菜肴非常好吃，特别是黄油鸡肉和daal。餐厅很小，但是经常有顾客和游客嗡嗡作响。该服务快速高效，业主拥有良好的客户服务。肯定会在下次旅行中再次访问。在巴萨，您找不到比这更好的印度餐厅。
Translated Review: I lived in Barcelona for 5 nights and visited this restaurant 3 times!Food is authentic Indian cuisine.The dishes are very delicious, especially butter chicken and daal.The restaurant is small, but there are often customers and tourists buzzing.The service is fast and efficient, and the owner has good customer service.I will definitely visit again in the next trip.In Barcelona, you can't find a better Indian restaurant than this.

Review original: 在巴塞罗那度假时，在这家餐厅用餐是一种绝佳的体验。工作人员非常专业和细心，确保我们的用餐体验得到充分享受。菜单有很多可供选择，我们的服务员通过提供食物和葡萄酒的建议真正帮助了我们。我和我的伙伴非常喜欢这里的食物和饮料，在巴塞罗那绝对值得一游！更多
Translated Review: During this restaurant, eating at this restaurant is an excellent experience.The staff is very professional and careful to ensure that our dining experience is fully enjoyed.There are many options for menu. Our waiters really help us by providing food and wine suggestions.My partner and I like the food and drinks here very much. It is definitely worth visiting in Barcelona!More
Into
Into

Review original: 我们在附近有一个会议，在找一个吃小吃的好地方。酒吧里有一些精心设计的元素。我们点了各种小吃，味道真的很好！加泰罗尼亚红葡萄酒口感好，味道好。酒吧的主人很友好。我肯定会推荐的地方，如果我在附近的话肯定会再来。
Translated Review: We have a meeting nearby to find a good place to eat snacks.There are some carefully designed elements in the bar.We ordered all kinds of snacks, the taste is really good!Catalonian red wine has a good mouth and good taste.The owner of the bar is very friendly.I will definitely recommend it, if I am nearby, I will definitely come again.

Review original: 傍晚时分，晚上7点，我们不得不等一张桌子。队伍很快就长起来了，10分钟后我们就在我们的桌子上了，非常细心的工作人员正在把我们的tapas订单拿出来。所有的食物分量都很足，大小也很好，最让人值得惊喜的是芦笋，煮的很熟很完美。总的来说，一家非常不错的餐厅，对我们来说很重要的一点是，它离克劳恩广场酒店只有2分钟的路程。
Translated Review: In the evening, at 7 pm, we had to wait for a table.The team quickly grew up. After 10 minutes, we were on our table. The very careful staff was taking out our TAPAS orders.All the food is sufficient and the size is also very good. The most surprising thing is asparagus, which is cooked and perfect.In general, a very good restaurant is very important to us that it is only 2 minutes away from the Claune Square Hotel.

Review original: 我和我的妻子在我们去看魔术喷泉的路上在这个可爱的地方吃了饭，从那里只有5-10分钟步行。我们大约7:30到达，15分钟内这里人满为患了。服务员很友好，装修很温馨。我们喝鸡尾酒，比我习惯喝的有点甜-是草莓做的-但独特而且充满水果味。我们点了4个小食和一个汤开启，一切都很美味。食物是充足的，但我们还是尝试了甜点，这并没有让人失望。非常合理的价格。肯定推荐！
Translated Review: My wife and I ate on the road of watching the magic fountain on the way we went to see the magic fountain, only 5-10 minutes from there.We arrived at about 7:30, and the people here were full of people.The waiter is very friendly and the decoration is very warm.We drink cocktails, which is a bit sweet than I used to drink-it is made by strawberries-but unique and full of fruit.We ordered 4 snacks and a soup to open, everything was delicious.Food is sufficient, but we still tried desserts, which was not disappointing.Very reasonable price.Definitely recommended!

Review original: 食物很美味——我们两个人之间吃了四个小吃，后来我们吃得很饱。我们认为价格合理——25欧元4道菜和两杯啤酒。我们非常喜欢它并且会推荐！
Translated Review: The food is delicious -we ate four snacks between the two of us, and then we were full.We think the price is reasonable -24 euros 4 dishes and two cups of beer.We like it very much and recommend it!
Into

Review original: 我们闲逛了好久才找到这个地方，但结果证明这是值得的。我们7：30到那，得到最后一张5人桌。地方不大，但是有美味的美食-对虾，猪脸肉，生牛肉片。饭后我们去了魔幻喷泉。
Translated Review: We wandered for a long time to find this place, but the result proves that this is worth it.Let's get there at 7:30 and get the last 5 -person table.The place is not large, but there are delicious food-pair shrimp, pig face, raw beef slices.After a meal, we went to the magic fountain.

Review original: 在旅行顾问在另一天带我们偶然去了一个地方，我们经过了漫长的一天并体验了一个坏的小吃后。爱它！我们来这里吃饭，一切都很特别，价格也可以负担得起。如果你想要好的小吃就来Taps；）
Translated Review: On another day, the travel consultant took us to a place by chance. After a long day and experienced a bad snack.love it!When we come here for dinner, everything is very special, and the price can be affordable.If you want a good snack, come to TAPS;)

Review original: 跟随着猫途鹰旅行的评论，在喷泉灯光秀之前为小吃停下。牛里脊肉是不可思议的，柔软多汁而且碳烤得很美妙。大虾很美味，虽然有点乱！山羊奶酪令人惊叹。服务是无法描述的，这个地方缺少一点气氛。但有值得一去的小吃。它分阶段上演，这样你才能真正欣赏每一天。一顿真正的爱情大餐-谢谢！
Translated Review: Following the comments of the Cat Eagle Travel, stopped for snacks before the fountain light show.Niuli spine is incredible, soft and juicy, and carbon roasted beautifully.The prawn is delicious, although it is a bit messy!Goat cheese is amazing.The service cannot be described, and there is a lack of atmosphere in this place.But there are snacks worth visiting.It is staged in stages so that you can really appreciate every day.A real love meal-thank you!

Review original: 我和我的搭档在浏览了互联网和猫头鹰后决定在魔力喷泉之前去这餐馆吃点东西。我们很高兴来到这里-食物是优秀的，好吃又新鲜，味道比我们在布拉斯发现的更好吃，。更不用说价值了——我们每人喝了2杯酒，吃了6份大份的菜肴，一共45欧元，我们简直不敢相信，和我们吃过的其他地方相比，我们会更乐意地付更多的钱。这里的服务非常友好。如果你想在魔力喷泉之前找个地方吃东西，我们建议你在晚上7点或之前到这里，因为我们晚上7点半抵达，这里几乎都满座了，有很多人在等待座位。
Translated Review: My partner and I decided to go to this restaurant before I browsed the Internet and owl after visiting the Internet and owl.We are glad to come here-food is excellent, delicious and fresh, and tastes better than we found in Brass.Not to mention the value -we drank 2 glasses of wine each each, and ate 6 large dishes, and a total of 45 euros. We can’t believe it. Compared with other places we have eaten, we will be more happyPay more money.The service here is very friendly.If you want to find a place to eat before the magic fountain, we recommend that you arrive here at 7 pm or before, because we arrive at 7:30 in the evening, almost all of them are full of seats, and many people are waiting for seats.

Review original: 这个地方不是太大，但是里面的气氛很棒，这可能是它永远都满座的原因，但的确是值得等待的。 食物美味，工作人员乐于助人。
Translated Review: This place is not too big, but the atmosphere inside is great. This may be the reason why it will always be full, but it is really worth waiting.The food is delicious and the staff is willing to help others.

Review original: 这里有很棒的食物，真正的西班牙小吃,这里不是巴塞罗那的热区，因此团队会尽他们一切努力为你提供一顿美好的晚餐和良好的氛围，而不是像那些游客一样威胁你。所以如果你想找真正的小吃，可以试试这个地方! 而且性价比很高。
Translated Review: There are great food here, real Spanish snacks. This is not the hot zone of Barcelona. Therefore, the team will do all their efforts to provide you with a good dinner and a good atmosphere instead of threatening you like those tourists.So if you want to find a real snack, you can try this place! And the cost -effective is very high.

Review original: 我们在魔术喷泉表演完之后偶然发现了水龙头，我们当然很喜欢这个表演。餐前小吃以及桑格利亚汽酒真的很棒，服务也很快。氛围也很棒。要注意下，因为厨房关闭的时间在晚上11点。
Translated Review: We accidentally discovered the faucet after the magic fountain performance, and of course we like this performance.Before the meal, the snacks and Sanglia's auto wine are really great, and the service is fast.The atmosphere is also great.Note that the kitchen is closed at 11pm.

Review original: 我们预定了在这家小吃店吃饭，因为它靠近魔法喷泉，我们很高兴我们的选择。这是我们第三次在一周的假期中吃小吃，这是迄今为止最好的。分量慷慨，非常好吃！他们也有一些诱人的甜点，但可悲的是，我们吃太饱了，不能继续尝试了（ - 我非常遗憾，因为我是一个甜食爱好者！我们强烈建议在这里吃饭，但首先得预订，因为它很小，非常受欢迎。
Translated Review: We book to eat at this snack bar because it is close to the magic fountain, and we are glad to choose our choices.This is the third time we eat snacks during a week, which is by far the best.Generous, very delicious!They also have some seductive desserts, but sadly, we are too full to eat, and we cannot continue to try (-I regret, because I am a sweet enthusiast! We strongly recommend eating here, but we have to book first becauseIt is very small and very popular.

Review original: 沿着南部拉登大道散步，就能走到这家酒店，周围环境很棒，完全物有所值，羊奶芝士沙拉非常可口，满足我的需求，这里的香肠也非常好吃，鸡肉也相当不错，我非常喜欢这次体验，景色也十分宜人，服务态度无可挑剔，工作人员乐于助人，值得推荐。
Translated Review: Take a walk along the southern bin Laden Avenue, you can walk to this hotel. The surrounding environment is great, and the whole thing is worth it. The sheep milk cheese salad is very delicious and meets my needs. The sausages here are also very delicious, the chicken is quite goodI like this experience very much, the scenery is also very pleasant, the service attitude is impeccable, and the staff is willing to help others. It is worth recommending.

Review original: 这里有最棒的，最正宗的，数量繁多的西班牙餐前小食（tapas）。十分的值得从主路或者在奥林匹克场活动开始前亦或者在去往蒙锥克公园的路上绕道来这里吃。这真的是我们在巴塞罗那发现的一个很有亮点的地方。
Translated Review: Here are the best, the most authentic, a large number of Spanish pre -meal snacks (TAPAS).It is worth eating from the main road or before the Olympic field or on the way to the Monar Park.This is really a very highlight we found in Barcelona.

Review original: 我们在猫途鹰上看了点评之后来的这里吃完饭，整个体验都很美好。辣汁土豆是我吃过最好吃的，我吃了好多。剩下的菜也都很好吃，酒也好喝。我们还点了桑格利亚酒，他家有很好喝的桑格利亚起泡酒。
Translated Review: After watching the review on the Cathawk, we came here for a meal, and the whole experience was beautiful.Spicy juice potatoes are the best I have ever eaten, and I have eaten a lot.The rest of the dishes are also delicious, and the wine is delicious.We also ordered Sanglia, and his family had a very delicious Sanglia sparkling wine.

Review original: 因为吃得太饱有个菜没吃完，老板竟然坚持给退了。腌制的虾的前菜非常好吃，烤鸡也非常的香，牛肉有点小腻。
Translated Review: Because I was too full of food, I didn't finish it, and the boss insisted on retreating.The predecessor of the pickled shrimp is very delicious, the grilled chicken is also very fragrant, and the beef is a little greasy.

Review original: 这里的晚餐非常棒。人们非常乐于助人，并会根据客人的要求提供很多不含麸质的菜式。他们甚至有无麸质面包!!饭菜很美味。我们吃了布拉塔芝士、橘汁腌鱼、乳猪，还有甜点“芝士蛋糕”。所有这些都很棒。那里的其他客人对他们的食物也都很满意。这是一个小地方，所以要么通过电子邮件预订，要么早点到，要么做好等位的准备。
Translated Review: The dinner here is great.People are very helpful and will provide many dishes without gluten according to the requirements of the guests.They even have a gluten -free bread !! The food is delicious.We ate Blaba cheese, orange pickled fish, suckling pig, and dessert "cheese cake".All of these are great.Other guests there are also satisfied with their food.This is a small place, so it is either booking through emails, early, or preparing for equal positions.

Review original: 我们在周边闲逛的时候，无意间发现了这个餐厅，并且那时有位置。我非常建议大家提前订位，因为餐厅很多人。我们吃了4个tapas，食物非常棒。我很推荐大家到这里来用餐。
Translated Review: When we strolled around, we accidentally discovered the restaurant and had a location at that time.I recommend that you bind a place in advance, because there are many people in the restaurant.We ate 4 TAPAS, and the food was great.I recommend everyone to come here for dinner.

Review original: 我们(8个朋友)在较小些的维亚纳餐厅预订了餐桌，但是出了问题，我们错过了时间。但是他们在街对面的姐妹餐厅给了我们一张桌子，同样的名字，同样的厨师，较新，非常时髦。食物和服务都很出色。布莱恩应该是最好的员工，因为他照顾我们，就好像餐厅是他自己的一样。感谢维亚纳的团队
Translated Review: We (8 friends) booked the dining table at a smaller Viana restaurant, but when there was a problem, we missed time.But the sisters opposite the street gave us a table. The same name, the same chef, is newer and very fashionable.Food and services are excellent.Brian should be the best employee, because he takes care of us, as if the restaurant is his own.Thanks to Viana for the team

Review original: 这是我第二次来巴塞罗那，不过是第一次光顾Viana餐厅，一定会再来的。我点了章鱼作为开胃菜，还点了牛颊肉，都很棒，味道好极了，餐厅的服务也超赞。同时价格也不算太贵，我一定会再度光临的。谢谢你们！
Translated Review: This is my second time I have come to Barcelona, but it is the first time to visit the Viana restaurant, and I will definitely come again.I ordered octopus as an appetizer, and I also ordered beef cheeks. It was great.At the same time, the price is not too expensive, I will definitely come again.thank you all!

Review original: 食物和饮料都很棒。我们开始点了黑莓，最后点了巧克力和樱桃，中间点的乳猪和牛面颊肉都非常好吃。餐桌很舒适，餐桌之间的距离会让你觉得即使周围是完全的陌生人，也一样吃的很开心。这家餐厅很像美国伊利诺伊州芝加哥市的Blackbird餐厅。
Translated Review: Food and drinks are great.We started to order BlackBerry, and finally ordered chocolate and cherry. The suckling pigs and beef cheeks in the middle were very delicious.The dining table is very comfortable, and the distance between the dining table will make you feel that even if you are a complete stranger around, you can eat very happy.This restaurant is very similar to the Blackbird restaurant in Chicago, Illinois.

Review original: 食物棒极了，这道300克的肋眼菜棒极了!菜单上没有这道菜，但是餐馆人员会给你提及这道菜!这道菜是我花过的最值得的30欧元。我建议你提前24小时预订餐馆的桌位，如果没有提前预订，餐馆就会在你等候的时候为你提供饮料。我们在这家餐馆用了餐，但不幸的事是今天是我们在这个地方的最后一晚，但我们会再来这个地方，并且会再来这家餐馆用餐!这家餐馆极棒!
Translated Review: The food is great, this 300 grams of ribs of eyebrow sticks are extremely! There is no such dish on the menu, but the restaurant staff will mention this dish for you! This dish is the most worth the 30 euros I spent.I suggest you book the restaurant table 24 hours ahead. If you do not book in advance, the restaurant will provide you with drinks when you wait.We used meals in this restaurant, but the unfortunate thing is that today is the last night we are in this place, but we will come to this place again and come to this restaurant for dinner! This restaurant is great!
Into

Review original: 我们在Trip Advisor上找到了这里。当时我们在巴塞罗那市中心的兰布拉斯大街(Los Ramblas)上，很多人排队。他们开门营业时，我们排在人群的前面。这里非常出色。尽管地方不大，但是每一部分都很完美。我们喝了一个很出色的南瓜汤，一份很棒的阿根廷肋眼牛排，还有一份美味的猪肉做的菜肴。价格公道，餐厅氛围很棒，食物的每一口都令人难忘。他们值得被评级为完美。我们一定会回去的。
Translated Review: We found here on Trip Advisor.At that time, we lined up on Los Ramblas in the center of Barcelona.When they opened the door, we ranked in front of the crowd.It's excellent here.Although the place is not large, each part is perfect.We drank a very good pumpkin soup, a great Argentine rib s steak, and a delicious dish for pork.The price is fair, the atmosphere of the restaurant is great, and every bite of food is unforgettable.They are worthy of being rated into perfection.We will definitely go back.

Review original: 最后一晚我们在Viana吃饭。我提前两个月订了位——位置很快就被订满了！所以一定要提前预订。这里的食物好吃得令人难以置信。我请我的伴侣吃周年纪念大餐，所以想要一些特别的东西，而Viana绝对可以做到。开胃菜是布拉塔芝士和伊比利亚火腿，两者都超级美味。我们的主菜是阿根廷牛排和牛面颊肉。眼下，我非常饱，所以不能吃完所有的主菜，但工作人员为我打包带回酒店，这是非常友好的。我在晚上很晚的时候再吃，虽然很冷，但味道仍然很棒！另外，黑莓莫吉托现在是我们最喜欢的饮料！
Translated Review: On the last night, we ate in Viana.I booked two months in advance -the location was quickly booked!So be sure to book in advance.The food here is incredible.I invite my partner to eat anniversary, so I want some special things, and Viana can definitely do it.The appetizers are Bulata cheese and Iberian ham, both of which are super delicious.Our main cuisine is Argentine steak and beef cheeks.Right now, I am very full, so I ca n’t finish all the main dishes, but the staff packs it for me to bring me back to the hotel. This is very friendly.I eat it at night at night. Although it is cold, the taste is still great!In addition, BlackBerry Mogito is now our favorite drink!
Into

Review original: 我们在这里共进情人节晚餐。工作人员非常友好，待人随和。我们吃了牛脸肉和鸡肉，还吃了芝士蛋糕和三份巧克力布丁。餐食出品绝对不俗。这是到目前为止，多年以来我们吃过最好的一顿饭。
Translated Review: We are here to enter Valentine's Day dinner.The staff is very friendly and treats others.We ate beef and chicken, and we also ate cheese cakes and three chocolate pudding.The production of meals is absolutely good.This is the best meal we have eaten for many years.

Review original: 每道菜都很美味，而且份量很足够，价钱也很合理，老公吃得很满意！吃完之后才发现这间餐厅排名很高，我们在误打误撞的情况下竟然可以吃到这么出色的菜式，真是太开心！
Translated Review: Each dish is delicious, the portion is sufficient, the price is reasonable, and the husband is very satisfied!After eating, I found that this restaurant ranked very high. We can eat such an excellent dish when we accidentally hit it. It is really happy!

Review original: 我们在找了地方吃饭后，没有预定就去了那里。我们并没有失望。这个地方很小，服务员们会把你塞进去，但你不会介意……因为看看这里的食物你就想留下了。我们很幸运得到了一张桌子。我们先吃了西红柿面包，还有很棒的炖牛脸和黑莓mojito鸡尾酒。这个地方很棒，工作人员很亲切，所以我知道为什么它能得到最高的分数了。
Translated Review: After finding a place to eat, we went there without booking.We were not disappointed.This place is very small, and the waiters will stuff you in, but you don't mind ... because you want to keep the food here.We were lucky to get a table.We first ate tomato bread, and there was a great stew face and blackBerry Mojito cocktail.This place is great, and the staff is very kind, so I know why it can get the highest score.

Review original: 巴塞罗那隐秘的小店，必须打卡的地点。但是需要提前预约，尤其是在周末，这家店一直爆满。众所周知这里的食物非常美味，当地人都因为预定满了而被拒之门外。牛肉面颊是必点的，但是每次预定之前最好询问一下有什么特色菜，说不定就会有意外的惊喜。
Translated Review: Barcelona's hidden shop, where you must check in.But you need to make an appointment in advance, especially on the weekend, this shop has been full.As we all know, the food here is very delicious, and the locals are rejected because they are full.Beef cheeks are necessary, but it is best to ask what special dishes before you book, maybe there will be unexpected surprises.

Review original: 虽然餐厅在市中心，但远离通常的旅游陷阱。食物和员工都很棒，他们甚至帮我们把自行车停在装修了两周的老餐馆里。我们吃的四道开胃菜都很棒:章鱼、金枪鱼塔塔、经典的bravas，当然还有布拉塔。食物足够两个人吃，主菜也是这个水准的。当晚的亮点是奶酪蛋糕和两杯桑格利亚汽酒。西班牙气泡酒更好。强烈推荐。
Translated Review: Although the restaurant is in the city center, it is far from the usual travel trap.Food and employees are great. They even helped us stop the bicycle in the old restaurants that were renovated for two weeks.The four appetizers we eat are great: octopus, tuna tower tower, classic Bravas, and of course Blata.The food is enough to eat two people, and the main course is also this level.The highlight of the night was cheese cake and two glasses of Sanglia.Spanish gas wine is better.highly recommended.

Review original:
地方方便
参观完圣家堂走路3分钟
英文菜单很好点餐
也可以直接看图点餐
店员看到我一个人
还建议我不要点太多会吃不完
餐点很好吃
Tropical sangria非常棒！！！
Translated Review:
Local convenience
After visiting the Saint Hall for 3 minutes, walk for 3 minutes
The English menu is very good to order
You can also look at the picture directly to order
The clerk saw me alone
I also recommend that I don't want too much to eat too much
The meal is delicious
Tropical SANGRIA is great!IntersectionIntersection

Review original: 刚到巴塞隆纳就来吃这家，服务生很友善，不过似乎传达错误以致于早餐点了双份。店内不大，比较可惜就是不能看到圣家堂，不然很完美。

意外经过，点了Lasagna、沙拉、Omelett combo，跟店员说明要共享一份餐点后，他们很贴心的自动把餐点平分成两份，送上的法棍🥖也是烤后热热的！

Review original: 员工非常乐于助人。让他们给我们的儿子做点菜单上没有的吃的，完全ok。食物价格很合理。我们点的东西都非常好吃。工作人员还给了我们很多建议，告诉我们去哪里玩，以及在这个地区有什么。我希望我们能再来一次，但我们第二天就离开了。一流的服务!谢谢你们！

Thank you!

Review original: 在网上讨论区排名最高，特意前来品尝，而且又近著名景点圣家族大教堂，享用午餐，叫了意粉，薄饼，不过不失。

Review original: 我们到这里来，是因为我们比在Sagrada Familia提前预定的票的时间要早。我建议你早点来，这样你也可以到这里来!咖啡、三明治和服务都是一流的。这就是当地人的生活，没有什么奇特的，只是每一种成分都恰到好处，经过了深思熟虑!而老板是一个很好的人。当两个美食爱好者联系在一起的时候，真是太棒了!

And the boss is a good person.It is great when the two food lovers are linked together!

Review original: 如果这个小咖啡馆是一个可爱的地方，在去参观萨格拉达-法米利亚之前可以到这里吃午饭。只有几张桌子，但值得等几分钟，如果可以的话。烤面包上加了烤辣椒的山羊奶酪美极了。工作人员很友好，很随和，我会再去的！
Translated Review: If this small cafe is a cute place, you can have lunch here before visiting Sargerada Familia.There are only a few tables, but it is worth waiting for a few minutes, if possible.The goat cheese with roasted peppers is very beautiful.The staff is very friendly, easy -going, I will go again!

Review original: 餐馆的食物是不可思议的,也是可爱的,店主是一个超级友好的人,我们去了一遍又一遍,他每次都记得我们，甚至给了我们一些免费的美丽奶油柠檬酒和还为我们其他几个人准备了一顿饭,因为喝了几杯桑格利亚汽酒，我们跌跌撞撞地回到我们酒店。这是一家有着美味食物的好餐馆。
Translated Review: The food in the restaurant is incredible and cute. The owner is a super -friendly person. We went to it over and over again. He remembered us every time.Personally prepared a meal, because we drank a few glasses of Sanglia's auto wine, we went back to our hotel.This is a good restaurant with delicious food.

Review original: 参观完圣家堂之后，我们来这里吃午餐。这里的员工非常友好，服务很棒。我们点了全家福，有火腿，起司，橄榄，洋荠还有面包。所有都很美味。我们还点了白天特色烤宽面条，也很好吃。我真希望我还有胃口去尝试其他的食物。这家餐馆很安静很放松，比教堂那些人满为患的咖啡馆好很多。下次我来巴塞罗那的话，一定还会来这里。
Translated Review: After visiting the Holy House, we came here for lunch.The employees here are very friendly and the service is great.We ordered the whole family portrait, with ham, cheese, olives, Yangzheng and bread.Everything is delicious.We also ordered the special baked noodles during the day, which is also delicious.I really hope I still have appetite to try other foods.This restaurant is very quiet and relaxed, much better than the cafe full of people in the church.The next time I come to Barcelona, I will definitely come here.

Review original: 咖啡和比基尼三明治都非常棒，并不惊艳但是非常出色，我还点了一个松饼，味道同样非常棒。坦白说，最让我感到惊喜的是餐厅的服务。服务生超级有礼貌，提供了完美的服务。就冲这一点，我会再次回来。感谢。
Translated Review: Coffee and bikini sandwiches are very good, not amazing but very good. I ordered a muffin, which tastes very good.Frankly speaking, the restaurant's service was the most surprising.The waiter is super polite and provides perfect services.Just rushing this, I will come back again.grateful.

Review original: 我们通过旅行顾问挑选了这家小咖啡馆，那天去参观了萨帕达家族。上午十点才到，得到了友好的接待。我的妻子点了煎蛋卷，虽然菜单上没有，他们还帮我做了煎蛋、火腿和烤面包。食物和咖啡棒极了。舒适的地方，随意，友善，加上美味的食物。强烈推荐!

Although there was no menu, they helped me make fried eggs, ham and grilled bread.Food and coffee sticks are extremely.A comfortable place, casual, friendly, delicious food.highly recommended!

Review original: 地中海巡游的最后一晚，在Gusto吃了晚餐。食物和服务都很棒。我们参加了11人的聚会，他们为我们提供了精美的住宿环境。我们吃了比萨，意大利调味饭，烤宽面条，凯撒沙拉等等。我们也有几瓶上等的葡萄酒。总而言之，这是一个可爱的夜晚。

Review original: 时尚的意大利餐厅，提供一流的菜单。工作人员很热情，服务很及时友好。我们有比萨饼（美味的基础，不要忘记白色比萨饼没有番茄，4个奶酪*非常*俗气），意大利面（完美无瑕）和我在任何地方吃过的最美味的牛排。我会再回到巴塞罗那再次拥有这个。 5 *食品，5 *服务，价格非常合理。

Review original: 我已经订购了3次披萨，总是我有一个惊人的产品。和Neaples一样的味道，当我说我的意思是真正的Tribunali地区。马苏里拉味道很棒，所有产品都干净清爽。披萨糕点的颜色是适当的粉红色，这意味着成熟的小时和酵母的数量之间存在完美的平衡。这种平衡不容易实现！此外，披萨基地清洁多余的面粉。这意味着maestro pizzaiolo不需要额外的技巧来处理披萨。我添加了一些照片来展示披萨底部是多么干净。这项技能只有经过多年的经验才能实现。更多
Translated Review: I have ordered pizza three times, and I always have an amazing product.The same taste as Neaples, when I say I mean I mean the real Tribunali area.Missrira tastes great, all products are clean and refreshing.The color of the pizza pastry is appropriate pink, which means that there is a perfect balance between mature hours and the number of yeast.This balance is not easy to achieve!In addition, the pizza base is cleaned with extra flour.This means that Maestro Pizzaiolo does not require additional skills to handle pizza.I added some photos to show how clean the bottom of the pizza is.This skill can only be achieved after years of experience.More

Review original: 之前系某个网站介绍而且咁岩系回酒店路上经过呢间小店，决定探一探好食程度。里面设计满布艺术色彩，画像挂满系墙上。点左香蕉Pancake ，当送到上枱一刻真系wow一声，好有份量，明明点左香蕉但有埋士多啤梨蓝莓水果，水果好丰富。Pancakes有成4块味道松软，配埋酱，简直系邪恶到一个点。朋友点既All day breakfast 食材都好新鲜不过当然冇Pancake咁吸引。

When it is sent to the stage, it is really wow. It has a portion. Obviously click the left banana but there is a burly borrower blueberry fruit. The fruits are so rich.Pancakes has 4 pieces of soft flavor and buried sauce, which is just a point.Friends order the ingredients of all day Breakfast, but of course, Pancake is attracted.

Review original: 这是我们第一次来这家餐厅吃早餐！这家餐馆很别致，饭菜也很好！我买了一小份，很好吃！强烈推荐这家餐厅！

Review original: 我看了关于这家餐厅的好评后去这里吃早餐，没有令我失望！烤面包和煎饼真是太棒了，我们吃得超级饱。工作人员也非常友好和礼貌，英语说得很流利。
Translated Review: I read the praise of this restaurant and went to have breakfast here without disappointing me!Baked bread and pancakes are really great, we eat super full.The staff is also very friendly and polite, and English speaks fluent.

Review original: 我要说的就是哇哦！！！！经过无数次的尝试，试图找到一个吃早餐的好地方，很高兴找到了Cremat 11这家餐厅！事实上，差不多一周后，我还想念这里的早餐。我希望在圣地亚哥也有这样一个地方，因为我每周都想去。我很喜欢这里菜单的简洁。食物并不复杂，但有各种各样的选择，甚至有素食！我点了鳄梨吐司，我丈夫点了本尼迪克特蛋，非常完美。水煮鸡蛋也做得很好。我们还分享了一些薄煎饼。我想吃光整个盘子的食物。它们蓬松，非常美味。这是我们有史以来吃过最好的！！！！你来这里一定要点东西吃。他们的焦糖做的非常好…简直找不到更好的了！！我们还点了一些新鲜的果汁，真是太好喝了。我真的不能再要求更多了！服务也很好，每个人都非常友好。氛围和装饰都很到位。就像我可以搬进来直接入住一样！这是一个隐藏的好地方，我很高兴这家餐厅没有像镇上其他的餐厅那样拥挤…在我看来，他们都被高估了，甚至没有Cremat 11餐厅的一半好！厨师真是不可思议！我希望他能每天给我做饭。当我们回到城里时，我肯定我们几乎每天都会在这里吃饭。
Translated Review: What I want to say is wow!IntersectionIntersectionIntersectionAfter countless attempts, trying to find a good place to eat breakfast, I am glad to find the restaurant CREMAT 11!In fact, almost a week later, I still miss the breakfast here.I hope to have such a place in San Diego because I want to go every week.I like the simplicity of the menu here.Food is not complicated, but there are various choices and even vegetarian food!I ordered avocado toast, and my husband ordered the Benti Dick Egg, which was perfect.Boiled eggs are also done well.We also shared some pancakes.I want to eat the food of the whole plate.They are fluffy and delicious.This is the best we have ever eaten in history!IntersectionIntersectionIntersectionYou must have something to eat here.Their caramel does very well ... It's better to find it!IntersectionWe also ordered some fresh fruit juice, which was so delicious.I really can't ask more!The service is also very good, everyone is very friendly.The atmosphere and decoration are in place.Just like I can move in and check in directly!This is a hidden good place. I am very happy that this restaurant is not as crowded as other restaurants in the town ... In my opinion, they are all overvalued, and there is no even half of the CREMAT 11 restaurant!The chef is really incredible!I hope he can cook for me every day.When we return to the city, I must have a meal here almost every day.

Review original: 我在Instagram上发现了这个餐厅，我想在这周早些时候来到巴塞罗那时，一定要来这家餐厅体验一下。这是一个古色古香的小地方，装修很不错，有着友好的员工，还有一个开放式的厨房。看着你的食物被准备好，这个过程是很诱人的。我点了本尼迪克特鸡蛋(这是我吃过的最好的蛋，我几乎每次在早午餐菜单上都会点这个)，我的同伴点了墨西哥式煎蛋。我们都很喜欢我们的食物。饮料价格合理。小吃和煎饼看起来也不错。早午餐在10-4点供应。如果我们在那里待得久一点，我们有一天晚上就会回来尝试一下别的菜品。这可能是我们在巴塞罗那吃过的最好的一顿饭，我们很享受我们在巴塞罗那期间吃的所有食物。如果我们回到巴塞罗那，我们一定会回到这里。

Review original:
暑假结束后，我们在30多岁时赶上了6个朋友（3对夫妇）。我们在门口受到了Marc的欢迎，Marc是着名的“be Burger”的主人和心脏之一，也是最新的“be Restaurant”。

餐厅的气氛非常热情。他们展示了他们熟知的精美啤酒选择，如果有疑问你可以提出建议。我们有一些patatas bravas开始，他们死了;不仅因为酱汁是真正的自制“布拉瓦”酱，而且因为土豆本身是由另一位店主阿尔伯特厨师精心烹制而成。

作为一个主菜，我有 - 大理，一个令人敬畏的150克肉馅饼，配有鹅肝和洋葱，正如我的要求一样。我的朋友们试过be-Pol，be-Mozart和Dolce Vita，他们都对所有成分的质量和细致的表现和电镀感到惊讶。我们用自制的白巧克力芝士蛋糕结束了这顿饭，这是一顿难忘的晚餐。

我们都不是素食主义者或素食主义者，但他们提供精选的素食汉堡和许多花园到餐桌的选择，使“be餐厅”非常适合有饮食要求的人。

“be Restaurant”的位置非常完美，距离Sants Estaci中央火车站仅5分钟步行路程，也就在蓝色地铁线（L 5）的“Enten a”站旁边。社区是放松的，但同时也是中心。如果您想在晚餐后外出或者想要在餐桌旁徘徊，那么这是一个很好的选择。
Translated Review:
After the summer vacation, we caught up with 6 friends (3 couples) in their 30s.We were welcomed by Marc at the door. MARC was one of the owners and hearts of the famous "Be Burger", and the latest "Be Restaurant".

The atmosphere of the restaurant is very enthusiastic.They show their well -known exquisite beer choices. If you have any questions, you can make suggestions.We have some Patatas Bravas, and they died; not only because the sauce is a real "Brava" sauce, but also because the potatoes themselves are carefully cooked by another shopkeeper Albert chef.

As a main dish, I have -Dali, a awesome 150 grams of meat pie, equipped with foie gras and onions, just like my request.My friends have tried Be-Pol, Be-Mozart and Dolce Vita, who are surprised by the quality and meticulous performance and electroplating of all ingredients.We ended this meal with homemade white chocolate cheese cake, which is an unforgettable dinner.

We are not vegetarians or vegetarians, but they offer selected vegetarian burgers and many gardens to dining tables, making "BE restaurants" very suitable for people with dietary requirements.

The location of "Be Restaurant" is perfect. It is only a 5 -minute walk from the SANTS Estaci central railway station.The community is relaxed, but it is also the center.If you want to go out after dinner or hover at the table, then this is a good choice.

highly recommended!

Review original: 这是所有人的经验。我们美国人在早上吃早餐。在漫长的一天里，我们在商店门前看到了美国早餐的招牌。我们决定第二天早上去。假设它们将打开，则它们在上午9点关闭。没关系第二天回到11点，他们关门了。所以第二天晚上8点我们去了，哇，他们开着。我们喜欢饮料和便餐。饮料很棒，食物也很好吃。真是太愉快了，我们第二天晚上只喝了酒。迭戈是一个勤奋的人，似乎非常喜欢他的手艺。
Translated Review: This is the experience of everyone.We Americans have breakfast in the morning.For a long day, we saw the American breakfast sign in front of the store.We decided to go the next morning.Suppose they will open, they will close at 9 am.It doesn't matter to return to 11 o'clock the next day, they closed.So we went at 8 o'clock the next night, wow, they opened.We like drinks and laxatives.The drink is great and the food is delicious.It's so pleasant, we only drank the next night.Diego is a diligent person and seems to like his craft very much.

Review original: 这就在我们酒店的拐角处，所以我们认为我们会放弃它并且它很棒。我们大约晚上9点去了，很安静，但很快就填满了。伟大的食物和葡萄酒和主人（迭戈）在手边聊天并推荐一些葡萄酒。我们真的很喜欢我们的晚上，如果我们再次通过这种方式肯定会回去
Translated Review: This is at the corner of our hotel, so we think we will give up it and it is great.We went at about 9 pm, very quiet, but it was filled soon.Great food and wine and owner (Diego) are chatting at hand and recommend some wines.We really like our evening, if we will definitely go back in this way again

Review original:
昨晚我们在Diegos餐厅吃了一顿丰盛的晚餐。食物绝对好吃吗？服务是一流的。老板杜兰对我们和其他客户非常关注。价格非常合理。

这是我们在巴塞罗那最好的晚餐！当我们将来访问巴塞罗那时，我们肯定会回到Diegos吃晚餐。
Translated Review:
Last night we had a rich dinner at the Diegos restaurant.Is the food absolutely delicious?The service is first -class.The boss Du Lan is very concerned about us and other customers.The price is very reasonable.

This is our best dinner in Barcelona!When we visit Barcelona in the future, we will definitely return to Diegos for dinner.

Review original: 您将找不到精致的商店前面或优雅的室内装饰，但食物非常出色，员工在客户服务方面无与伦比。我们去巴塞罗那的第一个晚上，因为它在酒店附近，真是一个惊喜。小吃和桑格利亚汽酒很美味。我们的服务员不友好，我们不记得他的名字，从不问他在餐厅的位置，但如果他不是主人，也许他应该是。如此美味可口，我们昨晚也回去吃晚饭。
Translated Review: You will not find an exquisite store or elegant interior decoration, but the food is very good, and employees are unparalleled in customer service.The first night we went to Barcelona, because it was near the hotel, it was a surprise.Snacks and Sanglia Auto wine are delicious.Our waiters are not friendly. We don't remember his name and never ask him in the restaurant, but if he is not a master, maybe he should be.So delicious, we went back to dinner last night.

Review original:
我们在巴塞罗那的五天里吃过的最好的一餐。我们到处都是奥林匹克港口，萨格拉达家族，兰布拉，el clot和码头。我的妻子最初不想在这里吃饭，因为餐厅似乎没有顾客，但进入后我们发现所有其他顾客都坐在餐厅的后面。我们为初学者享用伊比利亚火腿和鳕鱼油条，还有一壶美味的桑格利亚汽酒。而对于主要我有龙虾而我的妻子有泰国咖喱。
如果你想知道在哪里吃el clot，我强烈推荐Diegos。 *****
Translated Review:
The best meal we had eaten in Barcelona in five days.We are everywhere in Olympic Port, the Sagrada family, Landbla, El Clot and Wharf.My wife didn't want to eat here at first, because the restaurant seemed to have no customers, but after entering, we found that all other customers were sitting behind the restaurant.We enjoy the Iberian ham and cod churros for beginners, as well as a pot of delicious Sanglia somewhere.For the main I have lobster and my wife has Thai curry.
If you want to know where to eat El Clot, I strongly recommend Diegos.*****

Review original: 我偶然在这家餐馆吃了一顿午餐，享用了我的小吃。亮点是美味的自制蘑菇croquetas  - 我尝过的最好的炸鸡排。服务非常好，作为一名独行旅客，我感到非常受欢迎。如果您正在寻找一个简单的家常食物，并且不太喜欢简单的装饰，那么会推荐。
Translated Review: I accidentally ate a lunch in this restaurant and enjoyed my snacks.The highlight is the delicious homemade mushroom Croquetas -the best fried chicken chop I have tasted.The service is very good. As a solitary passenger, I feel very popular.If you are looking for a simple home food and do not like simple decoration, then it will be recommended.

Review original:
很棒的发现Clot地铁站附近！我被积极评级吸引到了这个地方，并没有让我感到失望，直到我连续三天回去吃饭。每次我们等待迭戈本人和同事，两位非常善良友好的绅士。食物无可挑剔地呈现和品尝美味（从炸丸子到章鱼，虾和甜点），我们在用餐结束时提供的免费草药利口酒也是如此。
这间装饰典雅的舒适餐厅可容纳20位客人。
Translated Review:
Great discovery near Clot subway station!I was attracted to this place by actively rating, and I didn't let me feel disappointed until I went back to dinner for three consecutive days.Every time we wait for Diego himself and colleagues, two very kind and friendly gentlemen.The food is impeccable and tastes delicious (from fried balls to octopus, shrimp and desserts). The same is true of the free herbal medicines provided at the end of the meal.
This elegant comfortable restaurant can accommodate 20 guests.

Review original:
我们在距离圣家堂不远的这家小餐馆吃过午餐，开始在BCN度假，这是一个很棒的选择！这个地方本身并不大，所以它很安静，很好看，工作人员非常温柔和快乐。我们尝试了典型的小吃，西班牙海鲜饭和当地甜点，一切都很棒。
重要提示：尝试他们的SANGRIA！你会爱上它的！ ！
Translated Review:
We have had lunch in this small restaurant not far from Shengjia House and started vacations in BCN. This is a great choice!This place itself is not large, so it is very quiet and beautiful, and the staff is very gentle and happy.We tried typical snacks, Spanish seafood rice and local desserts, everything was great.
Important Tips: Try their Sangria!You will fall in love with it!Intersection

Review original: 我们有一群12人走进来，迭戈自己坐在我们身边，等着我们。他是一位非常优秀的绅士，非常友好。我们有小吃和西班牙海鲜饭以及咖喱鸡肉菜。一块板比下一块好。桑格利亚汽酒非常棒，还有mojitos。如果您正在寻找一家提供正宗美食的当地餐厅，请不要错过Diego's！ ！ ！ ！
Translated Review: We had a group of 12 people in, and Diego sat next to us and was waiting for us.He is a very good gentleman and is very friendly.We have snacks and Spanish seafood rice and curry chicken dishes.One board is better than the next piece.Sanglia's auto wine is great, as well as Mojitos.If you are looking for a local restaurant that provides authentic food, don't miss Diego's!IntersectionIntersectionIntersection

Review original: 小古雅的地方。友好和细心的工作人员。山羊奶酪沙拉配香醋芥末酱，淋上覆盆子酱，非常棒。可能是我所拥有的最好的。坚果也增添了完美的紧缩感。 Solomilo牛排配薯条和pimientos del padron也很特别。对晚上很满意。
Translated Review: Small and elegant place.Friendly and careful staff.Goat cheese salad with fragrant vinegar mustard sauce, drizzle with raspberry sauce, is great.It may be the best I have.Nuts also added a sense of tightening.Solomilo steak with French fries and Pimientos Del Padron is also very special.I am very satisfied with the evening.

Review original:
一个很棒的小酒吧餐馆，有非常友好的工作人员。
食物很出色。 我们的山羊奶酪沙拉，牛排和炸鱿鱼。
这里的山羊奶酪沙拉绝对抢尽了风头。 这可能是我吃过的最棒的沙拉尝起来的我的生活。
一种很好的方式来结束我们在巴塞罗那的最后一晚。
Translated Review:
A great bar restaurant with a very friendly staff.
The food is excellent.Our goat cheese salad, steak and fried squid.
The goat cheese salad here absolutely snatched the limelight.This may be my life I have eaten the best salad.
A good way to end our last night in Barcelona.

Review original: Diego酒吧餐厅真是令人惊叹，友好的服务和创意美食。这是每个菜肴中具有创造性和美丽呈现的景观宴会。装饰也很舒适，兼收并蓄，别致。你可以闻到所有环境中的香料，不同的香气漂浮在空气中，如新鲜的香草，新鲜出炉的面包，大蒜和洋葱的香味，海鲜烤制，现煮咖啡和最重要的历史气味。这是与几种文化的会面，我们可以听到各种各样的lenguajes混合了厨房的声音，因为器具叮当作响，成分吱吱作响，一些平底锅嘶嘶作响，完美和谐。成分的质地是仔细关注质量的另一个证明。根据膳食的特点，它们保持煮沸的时间变成脆脆或柔软。最后但并非最不重要的是，味道是惊人的，这是每个口中的美食之旅，强调典型的西班牙风味。鸡尾酒和饮料精致而且无与伦比。当然，每当我访问巴塞罗那时，我都想回到迭戈的酒吧餐厅吃饭。这是物有所值的
Translated Review: The Diego bar restaurant is really amazing, friendly service and creative food.This is an creative and beautiful landscape banquet in each dish.The decoration is also very comfortable, and it is unique and unique.You can smell the spices in all environments. Different aromas float in the air, such as fresh vanilla, fresh bread bread, garlic and onion flavor, seafood grilled, coffee and the most important historical smell.This is a meeting with several cultures. We can hear a variety of lenguajes mixing the sound of the kitchen, because the appliance is dingling as a sound, the ingredients squeak, some of the pan are all over, perfect and harmonious.The texture of the ingredient is another proof of quality.According to the characteristics of diet, they keep boiling time crispy or soft.In the end, it is not the most important thing that the taste is amazing. This is a gourmet trip in each mouth, emphasizing typical Spanish flavor.Cocktails and beverages are exquisite and unparalleled.Of course, whenever I visit Barcelona, I want to go back to Diego's bar and restaurant for dinner.This is worthwhile

Review original: 价格合理的食物很棒，好喝得要命的咖啡推荐这里吃一顿饭很干净很热情。
Translated Review: Food with reasonable price is great, and it is very clean and enthusiastic about eating a meal here.

Review original:
我们刚刚抵达巴塞罗那，与父母一起吃饭。虽然非常安静，但食物非常好，并且对小吃的建议很明显！ Croquettas，bravas，empanadillas，jamon，tortilla。 。 。一切都非常好吃！

再加上几杯红色，我们真的度过了一个愉快的夜晚，谢谢！
Translated Review:
We just arrived in Barcelona and dinner with our parents.Although very quiet, the food is very good, and the suggestions for snacks are obvious!Croquettas, Bravas, Empanadillas, Jamon, Tortilla.EssenceEssenceEverything is very delicious!

Coupled with a few cups of red, we really spent a pleasant night, thank you!

Review original: 美味,友好且收费合理! 很快的服务和舒适的。 鲜榨的橙汁是最值得一提的。
Translated Review: Delicious, friendly, and reasonable fees! Fast service and comfort.The freshly squeezed orange juice is the most worth mentioning.

Translated Review: Recommended, it ’s really delicious, cheap and delicious. Several shops that can be eaten nearby can be ranked in the top of the top. You can really try it. You will not regret it!

非常精彩！服务很棒，食物也很棒！这家餐厅在巴塞罗那时是必须的。甜品也很好！

斯蒂芬诺（Stephano），非常包容和非常甜蜜，你会爱他的！ ！ ！ ？

图片说明了一切！ ！ ！更多
Translated Review:
very exciting!The service is great and the food is great!This restaurant is necessary at Barcelona.Desserts are also very good!

Stephano, very tolerant and very sweet, you will love him!IntersectionIntersectionIntersection

The picture illustrates everything!IntersectionIntersectionMore

Review original: 真的很棒的食物，友好的服务，而且一点也不贵！这家餐厅不是很大，所以我建议早点来。更多
Translated Review: It's really good food, friendly service, and not expensive at all!This restaurant is not very big, so I suggest coming early.More

Review original: Tripadvisor让我们来到这里，这确实值得！小菜单，但我们尝试了几乎所有的东西，真的很好吃！更多
Translated Review: Tripadvisor lets us come here, which is really worth it!The small menu, but we tried almost everything, it was really delicious!More

Review original: 虚幻。如果我在城里呆了一段时间，我会成为一个常客。不过，在一个4晚的住宿中多次感到内dining。奇妙的食物和环境，我喜欢开放式厨房，因此我可以看着他们的烹饪过程的每一步，并尽情享受。再说一次，一切听起来令人难以置信，我吃的一切令人难以置信。如果人们说他们习惯了饼干桶，那么根据您获得的食物质量，价格也非常合理。 3道菜和2杯酒，约合44欧元。在我的新英格兰小镇，大约80岁。服务也很好，当他们开心地做工作时总是很棒！
Translated Review: illusory.If I stay in the city for a while, I will become a frequent visitor.However, I felt Dining many times in a 4 night of accommodation.I wonder about the open kitchen, so I can watch every step of their cooking process and enjoy it.Once again, everything sounds incredible, and everything I eat is incredible.If people say that they are used to biscuit barrels, the price is very reasonable according to the food quality you get.3 dishes and 2 glasses of wine, about 44 euros.In my New England town, about 80 years old.The service is also very good, it is always great when they are happy to work!

Review original: 可爱的餐厅，优秀的员工，餐厅相当小，但友好和大气。价格合理的好食物会很乐意推荐。
Translated Review: Cute restaurants, excellent employees, the restaurant is quite small, but friendly and atmospheric.Good foods with reasonable prices will be happy to recommend.

Review original: 经过几天几乎相同的pinxos，tapas和platillo产品在我们的巴塞罗那逗留期间，这个宝石是奶油土豆，甜菜鲑鱼配鱼子酱，鸡蛋松露和土豆，火烤蔬菜。 。 。所有美妙的，和一个伟大的杜松子酒和滋补菜单启动。菜单还仔细地识别过敏原，包括无麸质的物品，所以不需要猜测，工作人员在球上。喜欢它 - 强烈推荐！ ！ ！
Translated Review: After a few days of almost the same Pinxos, Tapas and Platillo products in our Barcelona, this gem is cream potatoes, beet and salmon with caviar, egg truffle and potatoes, fire -grilled vegetables.EssenceEssenceAll wonderful, and a great Du Songzi wine and nourishing menu.The menu also carefully identifies allergens, including gluten -free items, so there is no need to guess, the staff is on the ball.Like it -strongly recommended!IntersectionIntersection

Review original: 我们想参观神奇的喷泉，在我们前往喷泉之前，我在附近的一家餐馆吃饭。我们到了晚上8点左右，很忙，我们很幸运找到了一张桌子。我们立刻得到了服务。他们只供应葡萄酒和啤酒。菜单有限，但足够和值得。我们的服务员推荐了几道菜，很美味。如果你在这个地区，我强烈推荐这个地方。
Translated Review: We want to visit the magical fountain. Before we went to the fountain, I ate in a nearby restaurant.We arrived around 8 o'clock in the evening, very busy, we were fortunate to find a table.We immediately got the service.They only provide wine and beer.The menu is limited, but it is enough.Our waiter recommends a few dishes, which is delicious.If you are in this area, I highly recommend this place.

Review original: 在蒙特利山上非常炎热的一天，我们想要一个安静的休闲场所，在去魔术喷泉之前享用晚餐。就在主要街道旁，我们发现了一家非常小的当地餐厅，供应小盘和小吃。我的妻子有饮食问题，但他们能够制作出美味的多盘餐，包括烤蔬菜，奶酪，特色厨师和烤牛排，这对我们两个人来说都是完美的。搭配一瓶冰镇葡萄酒，体验真正的美食。如果你想要一张外面的桌子，那么在晚上7点到达那里。只有3个。有内部酒吧类型的座位，但它小而精彩。他们不接受预订，所以只是出现！强烈推荐。
Translated Review: A very hot day on Montrea, we want a quiet leisure place to enjoy dinner before going to the magic fountain.Just beside the main streets, we found a very small local restaurant, supplying small plates and snacks.My wife has diet, but they can make delicious many dishes, including roasted vegetables, cheese, specialty chefs and grilled steaks, which are perfect for both of us.With a bottle of iced wine and experience the real food.If you want a table outside, then arrive there at 7 pm.There are only 3.There are internal bar types of seats, but it is small and wonderful.They do not accept booking, so they just appear!highly recommended.

Review original: 感谢Dani，感谢Stefano anf，感谢团队的其他成员提供这种美味的食物。 。 。 。这真是太棒了，我们肯定会回来！
Translated Review: Thanks to Dani, Stefano ANF, and other members of the team for providing such delicious food.EssenceEssenceEssenceThis is great, we will definitely come back!

Review original: 在猫途鹰上找到了这间餐馆，第一个晚上去了，他们已经完全被预订满了，所以我们预订并在第二个晚上回到这里！哇 - 谁知道有那么多种不同类型的烤宽面条！食物很棒但是是服务造就的 - 服务员叫Danilo（应该是）。他很高兴回答我们的问题/提出建议。食物分量非常慷慨，物超所值。一定会再回到这里，并告诉来巴塞罗那的所有人都来试试！
Translated Review: I found this restaurant on the Olthawk. The first night went, and they were completely reserved, so we book and return here on the second night!Wow -Who knows that there are so many types of grilled wide noodles!The food is great but it is created by the service. The waiter is called Danilo (should be).He was glad to answer our questions/to make suggestions.Food weight is very generous and worthy of money.I will definitely return here and tell everyone who come to Barcelona to try!

Review original: 我去过很多意大利餐馆，我可以说这是我迄今为止吃过最好的食物。份量很大，价格也很好，在这里工作的人也很棒。非常非常愉快的经历，每当我们想到我们的巴塞罗那之旅，这家餐馆总是我们的主要话题。我会把这个餐馆推荐给所有人！现在请在伦敦做一个特许经营！:D
Translated Review: I have been to many Italian restaurants, and I can say that this is the best food I have eaten so far.The portion is very large, the price is also good, and the people who work here are also great.Very, very pleasant experience, whenever we think of our trip to Barcelona, this restaurant is always our main topic.I will recommend this restaurant to everyone!Please do a franchise in London now!: D

Review original: 我们和另外两对夫妇一起度假。我丈夫选了这家餐馆，食物棒极了！！！我们品尝了不同类型的意大利千层面、宽面、肉酱面和螺旋通心粉。意式蒜蓉烤面包是最好吃的！！餐馆的工作人员是如此的乐于助人和友善。服务员乔凡尼（Giovanni）和老板丹尼洛（Danilo）都太好了！
Translated Review: We take a vacation with the other two couples.My husband chose this restaurant, the food is great!IntersectionIntersectionWe tasted different types of Italian thousands, wide noodles, meat sauce noodles and spiral pink powder.Italian garlic baked bread is the best!IntersectionThe staff of the restaurant is so helpful and friendly.The waiter Giovanni and the boss Danilo are both good!

Review original: 和我男朋友一起来吃的晚餐。员工很热情，好像欢迎我们到他们家里做客一样热情。意大利千层面超级美味！嗯嗯终于知道为什么这么出名了！提拉米苏做甜点很不错，但是手指饼干尝起来有些没味道。总之，这是在巴塞罗那的一顿美餐。
Translated Review: Dinner with my boyfriend.Employees are very enthusiastic as if we are welcome to visit their house.Italy is super delicious!Hmm, I finally know why it is so famous!Tiramisu is very good to make desserts, but the finger biscuits have tasteless.In short, this is a beautiful meal in Barcelona.

Review original: 很棒的食物。很高兴我们花时间找到了这个小地方。饭店挤满了人，但服务员可以让我们坐在外面。（如果你有计划去的话，一定要预订）服务很好。俯卧我们的是漂亮的卡瓦桑格里亚。丰富的菜单。女服务员告诉了我们一些特色菜，以及他们用的配料和新鲜面食，真是太好了。烤宽面条很漂亮，而且分量也很大。松露意大利面很漂亮。是我们吃过的最好的真正的意大利菜。甜点也很棒——巧克力心布丁，入口即化！罗谢尔蛋糕真漂亮！如果你喜欢意大利菜，你一定要来这个地方！
Translated Review: Great food.I am glad that we spend time finding this small place.The hotel is crowded, but the waiter can let us sit outside.(If you have a plan, you must book it.) The service is good.Lying lying lying on our beautiful Cavangria.Rich menu.The female waiter told us some specialty dishes, as well as the ingredients and fresh pasta they used, which was really good.Baked wide noodles are very beautiful and the weight is very large.Tulu's Italian noodles are beautiful.It is the best real Italian cuisine we have ever eaten.Dessert is also great -chocolate pudding, the entrance is melted!Rosel cake is so beautiful!If you like Italian cuisine, you must come to this place!

Review original: BlleBuon是一家朴实无华的意大利餐厅，以适中的价格供应美味的食物。简单的房间让每个人都能享受美味的意大利面（特色）和各种价格合理的葡萄酒。分量相当足——你可以很容易地把沙拉分开，然后选择烤宽面条或者黑松露的意大利宽面条。热情，个人服务很好，物超所值。
Translated Review: BLLEBUON is a simple Italian restaurant that supplies delicious food at a moderate price.Simple rooms allow everyone to enjoy delicious pasta (characteristic) and reasonable wines.The weight is quite sufficient -you can easily separate the salad, and then choose to bake wide noodles or black loosely Italian wide noodles.Passionate, personal service is very good, value for money.

Review original: 我们去过了巴塞罗那，到目前为止，这里是吃晚饭的最佳地方。工作人员非常出色，食物也非常棒，感谢在Bella Buon度过了一个完美的夜晚。理查德和卡门。
Translated Review: We have been to Barcelona. So far, this is the best place to eat dinner.The staff is very good and the food is great. Thank you for spending a perfect night in Bella Buon.Richard and Carmen.

Review original: 我们在猫途鹰上找到的这家BelleBuon餐馆，我们非常想吃些爽心的美食。BelleBuon餐馆让人惊叹，从新鲜的那不勒斯烤面包，到意大利肉酱宽面配自制意大利团子，当然还有自制提拉米苏。员工非常友好，餐馆挤满了人。强烈推荐给那些渴望在巴塞罗那吃到最佳意大利美食的人！
Translated Review: The Bellebuon restaurant we found on the Cathawk, we really want to eat some refreshing food.Bellebuon restaurant is amazing, from the fresh Naples grilled bread, to Italian meat sauce wide noodles with self -made Italian dumplings, of course, there are also homemade Tiramisu.Employees are very friendly and restaurants are crowded.Strongly recommend those who are eager to eat the best Italian food in Barcelona!

Review original: 天啊!我们真的没有想到会有如此美妙的经历。美食和服务都非常棒。菜量很大，所有厨房做的美食看起来都很棒。在这么棒的菜单中很难做出选择，不过意式千层面赢了!真是太棒了。这家店太棒了，我们明晚还要再来。
Translated Review: Oh my god! We really didn't expect to have such a wonderful experience.Food and service are great.The amount of food is very large, and all the food made in the kitchen looks great.It is difficult to make a choice in such a great menu, but it is a great level to win! It is really great.This shop is great, we will come again tomorrow night.

Review original: 我们在这家餐厅品尝了一顿很棒的意大利晚餐。我们点了一些蔬菜，还吃了一份很棒的burrata沙拉，里面有西红柿和芝麻菜……我们一行三人前往餐厅，大家品尝了蘑菇宽面条，一个人吃了烤宽面条。餐厅上菜及时，食物热气腾腾，美味可口。我们肯定会再来的!!
Translated Review: We tasted a great Italian dinner in this restaurant.We ordered some vegetables and ate a great Burrata salad with tomatoes and sesame vegetables ... The three of us went to the restaurant. Everyone tasted the wide noodles of the mushrooms and ate a baked noodles.The restaurant is timely, the food is hot and delicious, delicious and delicious.We will definitely come again !!

Review original: 我们选择来这家餐馆吃饭是因为这家餐馆的好评很多，虽然这家餐馆离我们住的地方有一点远。真的很高兴我们选择了到这边吃饭，这家店的食物和红酒，以及店里面的服务还有氛围都是特别不错的。我们非常享受在这家餐馆的就餐体验。在离开巴塞罗那之前我们一定还会再来这里吃一次的。这家店不是很大，所以你记得要提前预订。我非常推荐大家来这家店吃饭。另外，这家店的菜单上有很多蔬菜可以选择。
Translated Review: We chose to come to this restaurant for dinner because of this restaurant a lot, although this restaurant is a little far from where we live.I am really glad that we chose to eat here. The food and red wine of this shop, as well as the service in the store and the atmosphere are particularly good.We enjoy the dining experience in this restaurant very much.We will come here to eat again before leaving Barcelona.This shop is not very big, so you remember to book in advance.I highly recommend everyone to come to this shop for dinner.In addition, there are many vegetables on the menu to choose from.

Review original: 我和妻子在一个周日晚上来这里吃晚餐。我们从Buratta Mozarella沙拉开始，它分量很足，新鲜且美味-我们两个人一起分享了它。然后我们点了松露意面，配野蘑菇和香肠意面。两个都很新鲜且美味。最后我们吃了提拉米苏，喝了咖啡，作为甜点。这里的服务非常周到且总是面带微笑。食物很赞，服务很好，免费的Limonchello酒也超棒！
Translated Review: My wife and I came here for dinner on Sunday evening.We started from Buratta Mozarella salad. It was in full weight, fresh and delicious-we both shared it together.Then we ordered truffle pasta, with wild mushrooms and sausages.Both are fresh and delicious.In the end, we ate Tiramisu and drank coffee as a dessert.The service here is very thoughtful and always smiles.The food is very good, the service is very good, and the free Limonchello wine is also great!

Review original: 这家餐厅是圣保罗医院附近吃意大利菜的好地方。我们下午2点左右到的这里，发现那里的人很多。他们的特色菜是新鲜的意大利面，所以我们点了千层饼和宽条面，都很好。千层饼很新鲜。我们很喜欢吃。
Translated Review: This restaurant is a good place to eat Italian vegetables near St. Paul Hospital.We arrived here around 2 pm and found a lot of people there.Their specialty dishes are fresh pasta, so we ordered thousands of cakes and wide noodles.Thousand layers of cakes are fresh.We like to eat very much.

Review original: 我和我朋友昨天晚上来这里，他们都关门了，但丹尼尔特别好，他跟厨师说了一声，让我们进来。因为他们马上要打烊了，所以可点的菜品很有限，但他还是给了我们很好的建议。食物超级好吃，价格也相对很公道。如果你在这，想吃到正宗的意大利菜，我建议你去这里。
Translated Review: My friend and I came here last night. They were closed, but Daniel was particularly good. He told the chef and let us come in.Because they are about to snooze, the dishes are very limited, but he still gave us good suggestions.Food is super delicious and the price is relatively fair.If you are here and want to eat authentic Italian cuisine, I suggest you go here.

Review original: 意大利面特别棒。作为意大利人，我强烈推荐这家餐厅。我吃了最好吃的、新鲜的、有嚼劲的、自制的意大利面。你绝对可以感受到酱汁是用意大利人的热情和爱心制作的。这里的食物和工作人员（一个了不起的团队）对我来说是一次很棒的体验。强烈推荐！！！！！
Translated Review: The pasta is particularly great.As Italians, I strongly recommend this restaurant.I ate the best, fresh, chewy, and self -made pasta.You can definitely feel that the sauce is made with the enthusiasm and love of Italians.The food and staff here (a great team) here is a great experience for me.highly recommended!IntersectionIntersectionIntersectionIntersection

Review original: 我们很幸运地找到了这家餐馆，食物很美味，他们所有的意大利面都是自制的，沙拉很独特也很好吃。酒单上有各种价位的酒，我们品尝了各种各样的酒，我们的服务员是意大利人，知识渊博，也非常乐于助人。美味的食物，美好的体验，强烈推荐。Jay和Eddi
Translated Review: We were fortunate to find this restaurant. The food was delicious. All their pasta noodles were self -made. Salad was unique and delicious.There are various price wines on the wine list. We have tasted all kinds of wine. Our waiters are Italians, knowledgeable and very helpful.Delicious food, beautiful experience, strong recommendation.Jay and EDDI

Review original: 千层面搭配一些食材是我尝过最好吃的，让我在bellebuon餐厅享受了一顿美餐，它的披萨又大又好吃，不幸的是，没有小尺寸的提供，导致我的孩纸吃不掉的，我得吃更多。不足的是，餐厅的服务比较慢，让我们等了好一会，如果可以改进的话，这会是非常棒的
Translated Review: With some ingredients with a thousand levels, I have tasted the best food. Let me enjoy a meal at the Bellebuon restaurant. Its pizza is big and delicious. Unfortunately, there is no small size, which leads to my child's paper to eat.If you don't fall, I have to eat more.The disadvantage is that the service of the restaurant is relatively slow. Let us wait for a while. If it can be improved, this will be great

Review original: 这个地方好像把我们直接传送到了意大利。我们在附近的一家旅馆住了一个星期，经常从餐馆门口经过，（看到的次数太多）直到（最后）我们决定（去餐馆吃顿饭）试一试。我非常后悔没有早点去——虽然餐厅已经预订满了，但我们还是得到了一张桌子，只是要求我们在一小时20分钟内吃完——这已经足够了，因为服务真的很快。考虑到食物和服务的质量，这里也相当便宜(带有牛肝菌和新鲜磨碎的黑松露的意大利面条只需17欧元)。分量相当大，可以吃很饱。总体来说令人惊叹。绝对会推荐在西班牙（这个地方）的任何喜欢意大利食物的人或任何想尝试意大利美食的人（来这里）……。
Translated Review: This place seems to send us directly to Italy.We stayed in a nearby hotel for a week and often passed from the restaurant's door (too many times) until (finally) we decided to (go to the restaurant for meals) to try it.I regret not going earlier -although the restaurant has been scheduled, we still get a table, just asking us to finish eating in one hour and 20 minutes -this is enough because the service is really fast.Considering the quality of food and services, it is also quite cheap here (Italian noodles with beef liver bacteria and freshly grinded black loose are only 17 euros).The weight is quite large and you can eat it.Overallly amazing.It will definitely recommend anyone who likes Italian food in Spain (this place) or anyone who wants to try Italian food (here here) ...

Review original: 非常棒👍🏻宽面好吃到不像话，以此类推应该每一款pasta都很好吃，服务周到又热情，就餐氛围美妙，推荐来哦，AMAZING ：)
Translated Review: Very great noodles are delicious and unreasonable. This type of pasta should be delicious, thoughtful and enthusiastic, the meal atmosphere is wonderful, it is recommended, amazing :)
