Review original: 在巴塞隆纳旅游期间无意间造访的餐厅，餐点非常好吃且精致，员工热情亲切～还招待一小杯餐后酒，值得推荐！！
Translated Review: During the restaurant where I did n’t visit during the trip to Barcelona, the meal was very delicious and exquisite, and the employees were enthusiastic and kind ~ I also entertaining a small glass of meals, which is worth recommending!Intersection

Review original: 很棒的披萨，这个地方非常优雅，卢卡为我们服务，他是一位了不起的服务生。很专业。完全推荐??
Translated Review: A great pizza, this place is very elegant, Luka serves us, he is a great waiter.Very professional.Recommended completely

Review original: 与其他三个人一起在巴塞罗那进行了为期一周的西班牙之旅。我们在回酒店的途中偶然发现了这个地方。我们决定在睡觉前停下来喝一杯。很高兴我们做到了！从我们走进那一刻起，我们就受到工作人员的热烈欢迎。我们选择坐在酒吧，因为他们正要喝鸡尾酒。调酒师推荐了一些我们非常喜欢的非常美味的鸡尾酒。我们第二天晚上回来，并以同样出色的服务受到欢迎。他们甚至竭尽全力为与我们同行的朋友的最后一刻生日庆祝活动提供帮助。我们没有食物，所以我不能保证。我本人每年在巴塞罗那两到三次。下次我在城市时，我一定会回来检查这个地方。谢谢Luca，Charles和我现在不记得名字的另一位先生（我很抱歉），热情的欢迎，友好的服务/交谈和优质的鸡尾酒！迫不及待想再次访问并再次尝试食物！
Translated Review: A week of Spanish trip to Barcelona with three other people.We accidentally discovered this place on the way back to the hotel.We decided to stop before going to bed for a drink.I'm glad we did it!From that moment we walked, we were warmly welcomed by the staff.We choose to sit in a bar because they are about to drink cocktails.The bartender recommends some very delicious cocktails we like very much.We came back the next night and were welcomed with the same excellent service.They even made every effort to help the last moment of birthday celebrations with our friends.We have no food, so I can't guarantee it.I am two or three times a year in Barcelona.Next time I am in the city, I will definitely come back to check this place.Thank you Luca, Charles, and the other gentleman who I don't remember now (I'm sorry), warm welcome, friendly service/conversation and high -quality cocktails!Can't wait to visit again and try food again!

Review original: 我们与全家人度过了愉快的时光。食物和服务都很好，我们有比萨饼和面食，其中有非常新鲜和优质的食材。馄饨是我们最好的。我们的服务员Pablo使我们的住宿更加特别。 ？更多
Translated Review: We spent a pleasant time with the whole family.Food and services are very good. We have baked cakes and pasta, including very fresh and high -quality ingredients.。 Is our best.Our waiter Pablo makes our accommodation more special.IntersectionMore

Review original: 大约12欧元，您就能获得足够的比萨饼，让您真正吃饱。大部分披萨都带有各种类型的奶酪和蔬菜，但不多于肉类。 Pablo为我们服务，他是一个非常可爱的家伙。对食物和服务非常满意
Translated Review: About 12 euros, you can get enough pizza to make you really full.Most pizza have various types of cheese and vegetables, but not more than meat.Pablo serves us, he is a very cute guy.I am very satisfied with food and service

Review original: 和我的妻子和朋友共进晚餐。披萨做得很完美，有很多选择，我们在我们的服务器Pablo的引导下！强烈推荐这家餐厅享用轻松而价格合理的晚餐。
Translated Review: Dinner with my wife and friends.Pizza is perfect, there are many options, we are under the guidance of our server Pablo!It is strongly recommended that this restaurant enjoy a relaxed and reasonable dinner.

Review original:
我不习惯这个，但这次我想给这个伟大的餐厅一些话。拳头我要感谢我们的服务员“Pablo”提供非常好的和迷人的服务。餐厅有一个非常“感觉良好的氛围”，食物非常好，价格也很好。
我会推荐这家餐厅??
Translated Review:
I'm not used to this, but this time I want to give this great restaurant some words.Fist I want to thank our waiter "Pablo" for providing very good and charming services.The restaurant has a very "good atmosphere". The food is very good and the price is good.
I will recommend this restaurant ??

Review original: 我们来到这里的是我们2岁的儿子，他是一个挑食者。我们的服务员，巴勃罗非常细心，并建议儿子吃的菜。谢谢你的午餐！巴塞罗那最好的意大利
Translated Review: We came here were our 2 -year -old son, and he was a picky eaters.Our waiter, Pablo is very careful and recommends the dishes that sons eat.Thank you for lunch!Barcelona's best Italy

Review original: 与我的家人一起参观，非常时尚的餐厅，优质的服务，美味的食物，比萨饼。价格也合理。肯定会回来
Translated Review: Visit with my family, very fashionable restaurants, high -quality services, delicious food, pizza.The price is reasonable.I will definitely come back

Review original: 我们四口之家访问了Le Romane。在巴塞罗那过了几天，品尝了很多当地美食，我们正在寻找一个比萨饼，意大利面，沙拉等的夜晚，但我们仍然想要一个不错的地方，这将给我们在巴塞罗那带来独特的美食体验。 Le Romane很完美。我们离开的印象非常深刻！ Pablo我们的服务器很友善，知识渊博，并且在我们的访问期间非常周到。他让我们有宾至如归的感觉，并且非常谨慎地确保我们感到高兴和满足。其余的服务器和员工也很出色;当我们走进他们的前门时，主持人/调酒师非常热情，她向我们致敬。食物很棒，我们会回来吃比萨饼和剩下的食物，还有更多回来尝试，但是服务的质量和巴勃罗的积极能量以及全体员工让我们成为狂热的粉丝。
Translated Review: Our family of four visited Le Romane.After a few days in Barcelona, we tasted a lot of local cuisine. We are looking for a good place for Bisa cakes, pasta, salads, etc., but we still want a good place to bring us a unique food experience in Barcelona.Le Romane is perfect.We are very impressive!Pablo's server is friendly, knowledgeable, and very thoughtful during our visit.He gave us a feeling of guests, and was very cautious to ensure that we were happy and satisfied.The rest of the servers and employees are also excellent; when we walk into their front door, the host/bartender is very enthusiastic, and she pays tribute to us.The food is great. We will come back to eat pizza and the rest of the food. There are more trials, but the quality of the service and the positive energy of Bobaro and all employees make us fanatical fans.

Review original: 非常好的意大利美食，来自巴勃罗的优质服务！彻底推荐这里的意大利面和Nutella panna cotta是为了死。 。 。
Translated Review: Very good Italian cuisine, high -quality services from Bobaro!It is recommended that the pasta and Nutella Panna Cotta here are for death.EssenceEssence

Review original:
在阅读了好评之后来到这里，距离酒店只有一箭之遥。我们在看完照片后去了披萨，并对你如何获得不同口味的不同片段感兴趣。

我们的服务员Pablo在那里提供帮助并解释说我们各自选择两种“口味”。在我们之间，我们有一个玛格丽塔，烤辣椒，一个夹在中间的萨拉米香肠和一个土豆和香肠。每一个都令人难以置信！份量恰到好处，底部美味又香脆。到目前为止我们吃过的最好的披萨！
Translated Review:
After reading the praise, I came here, only one arrow away from the hotel.After reading the photo, we went to the pizza and were interested in how you get different flavors of different flavors.

Our waiter Pablo provides help and explain two "tastes".Between us, we have a Margareta, roasted pepper, and a Salami sausage and a potato and sausage.Each one is incredible!The weight is just right, the bottom is delicious and crispy.So far the best pizza we have eaten!

Review original:
优秀的餐厅，提供我曾经吃过的最好的比萨饼。我的女朋友和我去了我们酒店附近并订购披萨分享。大约20分钟后，他们给我们带来了免费的开胃菜，因为他们说有一个问题，这意味着我们的披萨需要更长的时间，但我们并不介意作为开胃菜（油炸马苏里拉和意式烤面包）都非常好，我们不在匆忙。披萨大约25分钟后出现，令人惊叹。你可以说它是全自制的，因为它有方形。所有浇头都有很多种口味，适合我们的口味。这也是一个很好的部分，因为我们都很满。尽管已经满了，我确实得到了Nutella和梨馅饼沙漠，这再次令人难以置信。
我们的服务员Pablo在整个服务范围内提供服务，而且每个在那里工作的人都非常友好。不能足够推荐。我们为披萨甜点和两瓶啤酒共支付了32欧元，这是物超所值
Translated Review:
Excellent restaurants provide the best pizza I have ever eaten.My girlfriend and I went to our hotel and ordered pizza to share.About 20 minutes later, they brought us free appetizers because they said that there was a problem, which means that our pizza takes longer, but we don't mind being an appetizer (fried Marrira and Missrira andItalian grilled bread) is very good, we are not in a hurry.The pizza appeared about 25 minutes later, which was amazing.You can say that it is fully self -made because it has a square.All heads have many flavors, suitable for our taste.This is also a good part, because we are all full.Although it was full, I did get Nutella and the pear pie desert, which was incredible again.
Our waiter Pablo provides services throughout the service range, and everyone who works there is very friendly.Not recommended enough.We paid a total of 32 euros for pizza desserts and two bottles of beer, which is worthwhile

Review original:
经过漫长的一天旅行和附近有限的开放式餐厅，Le Romane很受欢迎！他们慷慨地坐在我们身边，即使他们正在关闭厨房。服务无可挑剔，食物更好！ ！我点了一份他们着名的比萨饼。这是惊人的！ ！我的搭档订购了Rigatoni，它也很完美！

确保你在巴塞罗那时遇到这个位置。在我们访问期间，我想知道如何再次在这里吃饭。更多
Translated Review:
After a long day of travel and close -up open restaurants nearby, Le Romane is very popular!They sat generously next to us, even if they were closing the kitchen.The service is impeccable and the food is better!IntersectionI ordered a pizza for their famous.This is amazing!IntersectionMy partner ordered Rigatoni, it is also perfect!

Make sure you encountered this position in Barcelona.During our visit, I want to know how to eat here again.More

Review original: 最好的披萨，最好的是塞满了普罗拉（熏制奶酪）和香辣萨拉米香肠。宜人的地方和真正善良的人员关注价格平衡。很快就会回来品尝令人惊叹的意大利面食，我们看起来很棒，看着其他顾客。期待再次见到你
Translated Review: The best pizza, the best is full of Prove (smoked cheese) and spicy Salami sausage.The pleasant place and the true kind people pay attention to the price balance.We will soon come back to taste the stunning Italian pasta. We look great and look at other customers.Looking forward to seeing you again

Review original:
真是个美好的夜晚！一个不同的优秀比萨饼。 。 。披萨勒罗曼！一定不能错过Calzoncino nutella e pera！很快就会回来。 。 。和家人一起！
感谢Riccardo和Loredana度过了一个美好的夜晚。
Translated Review:
What a beautiful night!A different excellent Bisa cake.EssenceEssencePizza Leloma!Do not miss Calzoncino Nutella E Pera!Will come back soon.EssenceEssencestay with family!
Thanks to Riccardo and Loredana for spending a beautiful night.

Review original:
这家意大利餐厅很棒！
我在巴塞罗那找到了真正的罗马披萨，它真的像家一样！
气氛非常温暖，而且东西也非常好

Super建议：Suppl，Olive Ascolane和Pizza le Romane（有不同的口味！）。
Translated Review:
This Italian restaurant is great!
I found a real Roman pizza in Basello, it is really like home!
The atmosphere is very warm, and things are very good

SUPER suggestion: SUPPL, Olive Ascolane and Pizza Le Romane (have different flavors!).

Review original:
不能要求更多。来宾难忘的经历。服务是如此的热情和自然，以至于我们立刻就感到宾至如归。意大利面是不真实的。从来没有吃过厨师为我们准备的面食。
丹科丹科丹科谢谢格拉西亚斯。梅西<3
Translated Review:
Can't ask more.The unforgettable experience.The service is so enthusiastic and natural, so that we immediately feel the guests.The pasta is unreal.I have never eaten pasta that the chefs prepare for us.
Dancan Cordon, thank you Gracias.Messi <3

Review original: 与朋友共进午餐！最美味的意大利面和最贴心的客户服务，在我们离开时，就像一家人一样，是巴塞罗那最美味的餐厅！巴塞罗那最好的面食！ ！ ！ ！ ！ ！
Translated Review: Get lunch with friends!The most delicious pasta and the most intimate customer service, when we leave, like a family, it is the most delicious restaurant in Barcelona!The best pasta in Barcelona!IntersectionIntersectionIntersectionIntersectionIntersection

Review original: 工作人员是令人难以置信的，使我们的经验如此愉快！从来没有遇到过更热情的工作人员，而且食物简直令人难以置信！我有面gno，这是我一生中吃过的最好的。我很高兴我们走进这家了不起的餐厅，如果在巴塞罗那，必须100％参观
Translated Review: The staff is incredible and makes our experience so happy!I have never encountered more enthusiastic staff, and the food is incredible!I have gno, which is the best I have ever eaten in my life.I am very happy that we walk into this amazing restaurant, if in Barcelona, you must visit 100 %

Review original: 我们的最后一天来到这里，品尝了最美丽的巧克力羊角面包，而卡布奇诺咖啡真是太神奇了！ ！极力推荐，服务令人难以置信！没错
Translated Review: Our last day came here and tasted the most beautiful chocolate sheep horns, and Kabchino coffee was really amazing!IntersectionRecommended hard, the service is incredible!Right

Review original: 我去过的最好的意大利餐厅。意大利面是手工制作的，工作人员是意大利人（所以准备像他们的家人一样），食物也很棒。如果我回到巴塞罗那，我一定会去的！
Translated Review: The best Italian restaurant I have ever been to.Its Italian noodles are handmade, and the staff is Italian (so prepares like their family), and the food is also great.If I return to Barcelona, I will definitely go!

Review original:
第一次来巴塞罗那对Tapas点什么感到困惑的话，可以来这家店尝一尝。
两大套餐二选一，按就餐人数计价，最少两人。
在巴塞罗那5天，这家的味道和仪式感最好，父母也很喜欢。
店面不大但很温馨，服务员会介绍上来的菜品。
店坐落在小巷子里，按导航位置很好找，座位不接受预定。
Translated Review:
When you come to Barcelona for the first time, if you feel confused about Tapas, you can come to this shop to try it.
Two major sets of meals are selected, and at least two people are priced according to the number of diners.
In Barcelona for 5 days, this taste and ritual are the best, and parents like it.
The store is not big but very warm, and the service provider will introduce the dishes.
The store is located in the alley. It is easy to find according to the navigation position.

Review original:
非常好吃！
价格也非常合适，我一个吃带上一杯桑格利亚花了23.5欧，牛肉鸡肉蔬菜海鲜都囊括了，量也刚刚好。作为一个肉食爱好者，我尤其喜欢johnny推荐的西兰花和奶酪！
Translated Review:
Very tasty!
The price is also very suitable. I took a cup of Sanglia to spend 23.5 Euros. Beef, chicken, vegetables, vegetables and seafood were all included, and the amount was just right.As a meat lover, I especially like broccoli and cheese recommended by Johnny!

Review original: 好吃 甜品布蕾超棒的！！Jhoong小哥很贴心！推荐的很好！啊啊啊啊啊啊啊真好吃！推荐推荐！服务生人很好哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈
Translated Review: Delicious dessert Bole is great!IntersectionBrother Jhoong is very intimate!Recommended well!AhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhRecommended recommendation!The waiter is very good hahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha

Review original: 虽然等待了20分钟，但是是非常值得的。服务和环境非常棒。我们点了suprise tapas 食物很新鲜味道很棒。强烈推荐Jhonny调的Blackberry Mojito 蓝莓鸡尾酒 ，如果遇到一定要点，非常的赞。
Translated Review: Although waiting for 20 minutes, it is very worthwhile.The service and environment are great.We ordered Suprise Tapas foods are very fresh.The Blackberry Mojito cocktail adjusted by Jhonny is highly recommended. If you encounter a certain point, it is very good.

Review original:
首先我要说这家店的服务好好！点名表扬Cesan小哥哥！特别友善，推荐也很棒！

然后这家店只有两种菜单，都是套餐，一种是人均20欧一种是25欧。区别是25欧会有个前菜，有火腿，奶酪，小披萨饼，和看起来像Salami 。剩下的就一样的，先是一个冷盘，有火腿沙拉奶油土豆饼，然后是每个人4个Tapa，我吃的都挺好吃的，饮料我就是点了他们最经典的调酒。

总之体验超级棒，而且我吃的太饱了。最后一杯咖啡解腻！太完美了！
Translated Review:
First of all, I want to say that the service of this shop is good!Name praise CESAN brother!It is particularly friendly, and it is also great!

Then there are only two menus in this shop, both of which are set meals, one is 20 Euros per capita, one is 25 Euros.The difference is that 25 Euros will have a front dish, ham, cheese, small pizza cakes, and look like Salami.The rest is the same, first a cold disk, ham salad cream potato cake, and then 4 TAPA everyone. I eat it very delicious. I just ordered their most classic alcohol.

In short, the experience is super great, and I eat too much.The last cup of coffee is greasy!so perfect!
Into

Review original: 服务员热情大方，可以到吧台选择喜欢的tapas，服务生会跟你解释是什么东西，每样3-4欧不等，很传统的西班牙菜肴，推荐！
Translated Review: The waiter is enthusiastic and generous. You can go to the bar to choose the favorite TAPAS. The waiter will explain to you what it is. Each is 3-4 Euros. It is very traditional Spanish dishes. It is recommended!

Review original: 我们排了45分钟队，而且这真的很值！这里有着非常美味的餐前小吃和绝佳的氛围，如果你想真正体验一下西班牙的话，我会向你推荐这里的。工作人员也非常友好。唯一的缺点是座位有点不舒服，因为大多数座位都是凳子，但除此之外，这里真是太棒了！
Translated Review: We lined up for 45 minutes, and this is really worth it!There are very delicious meals and an excellent atmosphere. If you want to really experience Spain, I will recommend it to you.The staff is also very friendly.The only disadvantage is that the seat is a bit uncomfortable, because most seats are stools, but in addition, this is really great here!

Review original: 伙计们，这是目前为止我在西班牙旅游遇到的最好的餐厅!!这里的食物美味，而且十分有吸引力。我建议前往服务员为你点餐前小吃的区域享用美食，相信我，服务员知道你需要什么。强烈推荐这家餐厅。
Translated Review: Guys, this is the best restaurant I met in Spain so far !! The food here is delicious and very attractive.I suggest to go to the waiter to enjoy the food for you to order the snack before, believe me, the waiter knows what you need.Strongly recommend this restaurant.

Review original: 我来这家餐馆吃晚餐。这个地方很小，但是很舒服，可能你得在这里等一会才能吃上东西。餐馆里的服务员非常热情（Gianmarco是最棒的！），他们对于你将要尝试到的食物解释得很仔细。有一件很重要的事你需要知道，这里只接受现金付款。
Translated Review: I came to this restaurant for dinner.This place is very small, but it is very comfortable. Maybe you have to wait here for a while to eat.The waiter in the restaurant is very enthusiastic (GianMarco is the best!), They explained very carefully about the food you will try.One of the important things you need to know, only cash payment is accepted here.

Review original: 这完全是传统的塔帕斯体验——吧台摆放着几盘小吃，价格不贵，但酒很不错，大杯的桑格利亚酒也很赞。点上一杯酒，或者两个人来点一盘小吃都是很不错的。我们点了拼盘，有8种小食，再加上面包、曼彻格芝士和伊比利亚火腿——两个人吃完全足够。员工很友好很热情，为这个晚上画上了一个圆满的句号。
Translated Review: This is completely a traditional Tapas experience -a few plates of snacks are placed in the bar, the price is not expensive, but the wine is very good.Order a glass of wine, or two people to order a plate of snacks are very good.We ordered the platter with 8 kinds of snacks, plus bread, Manchester cheese, and Iberian ham -two people were enough to eat.The employees are very friendly and enthusiastic, drawing a successful end to this evening.

Review original: 我们一组有五个人，为了找到这个地方，我们迷路了，但我们确实很高兴找到了这个地方！工作人员很友好，在酒吧给我们弄到了一张桌子。食物绝对很美味，我愿意再次回到这家餐馆吃更多食物。如果我住在这个城市，我每晚都会来这里。
Translated Review: We have five people in a group. In order to find this place, we lost, but we are really glad to find this place!The staff was very friendly and gave us a table in the bar.The food is absolutely delicious, and I am willing to return to this restaurant to eat more food again.If I live in this city, I will come here every night.

Review original: 店员很会营销，推荐的tapas应该稍微贵点，不过也挺好吃就是了。btw，我以后一定要多看bill，改掉不看bill的习惯。那位glanmarco的服务到时很不错哦
Translated Review: The clerk is very good at marketing. The recommended TAPAS should be slightly more expensive, but it is also delicious.BTW, I must look at Bill in the future, and change the habit of not looking at Bill.The service of the GLANMARCO is very good,

Review original: 这是一家很棒的餐馆，餐馆里面干净整洁。我们在这里点的所有的小吃加起来只花了29欧元。我们大家一起品尝了28种不同的小吃，所有的食物都非常的新鲜，而且也很美味，当地的红酒也非常不错。我唯一想吐槽的就是这家餐馆实在是太小了，所以推荐大家早一点过来。
Translated Review: This is a great restaurant with clean and tidy restaurants.All the snacks we ordered here spent only 29 euros.We all tasted 28 different snacks together. All the foods were very fresh and delicious. The local red wine was also very good.The only thing I want to talk about is that this restaurant is too small, so I recommend everyone to come earlier.

Review original: 我们在猫途鹰上找到了这家餐厅，很高兴能找到一个位子。美味的小吃，不错酒，以及一个非常亲切的叫sherry的女服务员。祝你在Karlsruhe的时光好运，去海德堡的话一定要来找我们，我们在Neo餐厅等你:)。我们在这里度过了一个愉快的夜晚。
Translated Review: We found this restaurant on the Cathawk and were glad to find a seat.Delicious snacks, good wine, and a very affectionate female waiter called Sherry.I wish you a good luck in Karlsruhe. If you go to Heidelberg, you must come to us. We are waiting for you at NEO Restaurant :).We have a pleasant night here.

Review original: 我和一位同事在这里度过了一个美妙的夜晚。这是一个舒适的小地方，提供美味的小吃。我们受到了如此的欢迎，我们得到了一些关于如何尝试的极好的建议和雪利的惊人的服务。我们迫不及待地要再回去了！
Translated Review: A colleague and I spent a wonderful night here.This is a comfortable small place, providing delicious snacks.We have been so popular, and we have received some excellent suggestions on how to try and the amazing services of Sher.We can't wait to go back!

Review original: 所有东西都很好吃。这里不提供鱼肉小吃，只提供肉类小吃和素食小吃。我们点了主厨精选（套餐）（the chef's choice）。餐厅员工会问你是否对什么东西过敏，或是有什么东西你不吃的，他们将会按照你的口味需求为你烹饪。这家餐厅只接受现金结账。我们的女侍应Sherry超赞。
Translated Review: Everything is delicious.There are no fish snacks here, only meat and vegetarian snacks are provided.We ordered the chef's selection (The Chef's Choice).The restaurant employees will ask if you are allergic to what or what you don't eat. They will cook for you according to your taste needs.This restaurant only accepts cash checkout.Our female waiter is superb.

Review original: 我们在下午6点吃了一顿美妙的晚餐（餐厅很小，所以建议早点去，这样可以避免等待），我们吃到了美味的食物，招待我们的女服务员Kareen非常友好和乐于助人！谢谢！
Translated Review: We ate a wonderful dinner at 6 pm (the restaurant is small, so it is recommended to go early so that we can avoid waiting). We have eaten delicious food and entertain our female waiter Karen very friendly and helpful!Thanks!

Review original: 我们在巴塞罗那最后一晚来到了这家餐馆。这家餐馆刚开门就客满了。我们坐在酒吧里。我们的服务员卢卡斯先生向我们展示了这里的小吃(根据我们的喜好)，并让我们相信他的介绍。他对这里的一切食物都了如指掌。有些好的小吃我们自己又买了一份。桑格利亚汽酒的味道不错，账单价格也很合理。如果你想要小吃，到这里来吧。你不会失望的。
Translated Review: We came to this restaurant last night in Barcelona.This restaurant was full as soon as it opened.We sat in the bar.Our waiter Mr. Lucas showed us the snacks (according to our preferences) and let us believe in his introduction.He pointed at all the food here.We bought another good snack.Sanglia's steam wine tastes good, and the price of billing is also very reasonable.If you want snacks, come here.You will not be disappointed.

Steak tartar 好好吃！ 
我个人认为这家的菜真的很好吃、甜点超棒的！ 
我们跟朋友来尝了不同道菜、真的不错，价钱也不会很高。
建议你们点不同的菜来尝尝。 

服务员很贴心，也招待的很好！ 
一定会再来的。
Translated Review:
Steak Tartar is delicious!
I personally think that this dish is really delicious and great!
We came to taste different dishes with friends. It was really good, and the price would not be very high.
It is recommended that you order different dishes to taste.

The waiter is very intimate, and also entertains very well!
Will definitely come again.

Review original: 我来这里喝饮料，价格很好，啤酒质量很高，服务友好、高效。强烈推荐。更多
Translated Review: I came here to drink drinks. The price is very good, the quality of beer is very high, and the service is friendly and efficient.highly recommended.More

Review original: 在巴塞罗那呆的一个星期里，去了三次Blu bar。他们供应很多素食，尝起来非常美味，尤其是玉米卷。这也是一个可以去喝一杯的好地方。更多
Translated Review: For a week in Barcelona, I went to Blu Bar three times.They supply a lot of vegetarian food and taste very delicious, especially corn rolls.This is also a good place to drink a cup.More

Review original: 昨晚我们在Blu Bar吃了一顿美餐。服务器超级有用和友好，这里有各种各样的gf和纯素食食品。我们有calzone和gf小面包，好吃！还有甜点，一种红薯布朗尼蛋糕，比我以前买过的任何布朗尼蛋糕都好吃，少了一个gf / df。我们强烈建议您造访。更多
Translated Review: Last night we ate a beautiful meal at Blu Bar.The server is super useful and friendly. There are various GF and vegan foods here.We have Calzone and GF small bread, delicious!There are also desserts, a kind of sweet potato Browni cake, which is delicious than any Browni cake I bought before, and one less GF / DF.We strongly recommend that you visit.More

Review original: 精湛的素食食品。很棒的冰沙，炸玉米饼，扁平面包和比萨饼。巴塞罗那周边地区的真正发现。更多
Translated Review: Exquisite vegetarian food.Great smoothie, fried corn cakes, flat tubes and pizza cakes.Real discovery in the surrounding areas of Barcelona.More

Review original:
我们来到蓝酒吧（Blu Bar）寻找在Poblenou可以吃的纯素食，这给了我最大的惊喜。食物很棒。我们有炸玉米饼，比萨饼和calzone，我对Calzone的出色程度感到不胜枚举，因为在意大利以外很难找到优质的，更不用说素食主义者了。位置和餐厅气氛很好，工作人员热情友好。我们不得不等我们的食物，但是这个地方人头packed动，所以不能指望最快的服务。
期待回去尝试更多的东西。更多
Translated Review:
We came to Blu Bar to find the prime element that can be eaten in POBLENOU, which gave me the biggest surprise.The food is great.We have fried corn cakes, pizza cakes and Calzone. I feel that Calzone is excellent, because it is difficult to find high -quality ones outside Italy, let alone vegetarians.The location and restaurant atmosphere are very good, and the staff is enthusiastic and friendly.We have to wait for our food, but this place is Packed, so we cannot expect the fastest service.
Looking forward to going back and trying more things.More

Review original: 冷却地方。美味的食物，很棒的服务，如果有机会，我每晚都会在这里吃饭。 。 。 。 。 。奥勒更多
Translated Review: Cool the place.Delicious food, great service, if you have a chance, I will eat here every night.EssenceEssenceEssenceEssenceEssenceOle more

Review original: 我们最喜欢的酒吧之一。我们每年至少访问巴塞罗那一次，总是来这里。食物非常好，工作人员很友好，位置很棒。它有一个很好的嗡嗡声，是一个完美的人们观看点，但比市中心的地方更冷。 Poble Nou也是一个值得探索的美丽地区。更多
Translated Review: One of our favorite bars.We visit Barcelona at least once a year and always come here.The food is very good, the staff is very friendly, and the position is great.It has a good buzz, a perfect watching point, but colder than the place in the city center.POBLE NOU is also a beautiful area worth exploring.More

Review original: 这是午餐的好地方。比萨饼是原创的（之前从未见过）并且真的很有点味道。我推荐这家餐厅。更多
Translated Review: This is a good place for lunch.Pizza is original (never seen before) and it is really a bit delicious.I recommend this restaurant.More

Review original: 我们坐在外面，因为晚上天气变冷，我们的主人用温暖的毯子包裹着我们！美味的素食和纯素食品，自制，原创等。我们被一个当地人带到这里，这个地方充满了快乐。
Translated Review: We sat outside because the weather became colder at night, and our owner wrapped us with warm blankets!Delicious vegetarian and vegan foods, self -made, original, etc.We are brought here by a locals, and this place is full of happiness.

Review original: 我们去吃午饭了。这不是很忙，所以我们在窗边看到一张好桌子。我们有炸玉米饼cochinita，藜麦沙拉和Bufalo y serrano披萨。他们都非常出色。强烈推荐餐厅。更多
Translated Review: We went to lunch.This is not very busy, so we see a good table by the window.We have fried corn cakes Cochinita, quinoa salad and Bufalo Y Serano pizza.They are all very good.Strongly recommend restaurants.More

Review original: 来这里喝几杯葡萄酒，吃点东西，享受我们的访问。服务真的很可爱。我们点了鸡肉玉米片非常好吃，不幸的是鸡肉很少，令人失望。这款酒价格合理。当我们回来时，我们可能会回来再吃更多的食物，因为虽然我们的菜没有鸡肉，但它非常好吃。更多
Translated Review: Come here to drink a few glasses of wine, eat something, and enjoy our visit.The service is really cute.We ordered chicken and corn slices very delicious. Unfortunately, there were very few chicken, which was disappointing.The price of this wine is reasonable.When we come back, we may come back to eat more food, because although our dishes do not have chicken, it is very delicious.More

Review original: 非常好的员工！ ！尽管我们第一次来到这里，但我们觉得他们从此之前就认识了我们。绝对肯定会回来！更多
Translated Review: Very good employee!IntersectionAlthough we came here for the first time, we felt that they had known us since then.Absolutely definitely come back!More

Review original: 一个与朋友一起停留的好地方。良好的氛围，员工和服务。强烈建议路过该地区的任何人。绝对是Poblenou地区最好的酒吧之一。夏季超级寒冷，冬季温暖宜人。真棒，在附近有这么酷的地方！更多
Translated Review: A good place to stay with friends.Good atmosphere, employees and services.It is strongly recommended that anyone passing by in the area.It is definitely one of the best bars in the POBLENOU area.It is super cold in summer and warm and pleasant in winter.Awesome, there is such a cool place nearby!More

Review original: 上周四在这里吃了一口快餐。美味的食物，没有大惊小怪和非常友好的主人。强烈推荐冷藏小吃。
Translated Review: I ate a fast food here last Thursday.Delicious food, no fuss and very friendly owner.Strongly recommend refrigerated snacks.

Review original: 我们在这里住了一周 3 分钟的距离，我很喜欢非正式的气氛，很棒的服务，从人的胡子。更多
Translated Review: We lived here for a 3 -minute distance here. I like an informal atmosphere, great service, from the beard of people.More

Review original: 这里的食物很棒，一直都很新鲜。 这里的价格很好，你得到的食物的质量（非常高的水准），我总是吃东西，决定当我在这里的时候，因为我看到盘子。 这里的老板超级友好，会说英语，靠近西班牙。 这里的葡萄酒也很好，露台很完美。我很喜欢这里的三文鱼披萨。非常非常非常推荐这家酒店。 这里离海滩很近，所以是个放松休息的好地方，在一整天的海滩。 他们有很棒的披萨，但是餐前小吃和其他很好的选择比如沙拉。更多

Translated Review: Ordered mixed roasted vegetables and prawns as appetizers, grilled chicken and smoked meat for the main dish, two glasses of wine and a pot of Sanglier.A total of less than 80 euros.Food is delicious and affordable.The only thing that did not get 5 stars was that the restaurant window extended to the cushion bench of each dining table was too high, and my wife's feet could not be on the ground. Fortunately, I was taller than her.More

Review original: 我们预约的时候不太清楚有什么优惠。我们到的时候觉得自己穿着不得体，餐厅比较高档，但我们一行人中有人穿了牛仔裤。服务很好，食物很美味，服务员也一直在周围，及时为我们服务。更多
Translated Review: When we make an appointment, we don't know what kind of discounts are.When we arrived, we felt that we were not able to wear it, and the restaurant was relatively high -end, but some of us wearing jeans.The service is very good, the food is delicious, and the waiters have been around to serve us in time.More

Review original: 我的一个朋友给我推荐了这个地方,这是一个很好的“惊喜”。餐厅非常现代和优雅,这里有友好和乐于助人的服务团队——真的很感谢他们的服务。同时，他们的葡萄酒的选择相当棒,喜欢葡萄酒的人可以尝试一下。最后…价格非常非常的公平——他们很为你的钱包着想。更多
Translated Review: One of my friends recommended this place to me, this is a good "surprise".The restaurant is very modern and elegant. There are friendly and helpful service teams here -I really thank their service.At the same time, their wine choices are great, and people who like wine can try it.In the end ... the price is very, fair -they think about your wallet.More

Review original: 我已经在巴塞罗那住了18个月了。到目前为止，这是我在城里最喜欢的一家餐厅。首先，食物性价比非常高。其次，这里服务一流。我试过他们家的牛排和鱼，两样都非常地道。我强烈推荐那些想吃巴塞罗那当地菜品的人来9 Nine餐厅更多
Translated Review: I have lived in Baselo for 18 months.So far, this is my favorite restaurant in the city.First of all, food is very cost -effective.Second, the service here is first -class.I tried their steaks and fish, both of which were very authentic.I strongly recommend those who want to eat local dishes in Barcelona to come to 9 NINE restaurants more

Review original: 我从未去过巴塞罗那，我想它会像大多数其他欧洲城市一样。遗憾的是，我错了。Nine是我在巴塞罗那体验的第一家餐厅。食物很好吃。服务很特别。他们在周六晚上可以为6个人提供住宿，只需提前4小时打电话。强烈推荐。我们应该拍更多照片，但是我们吃光了所有的东西。更多
Translated Review: I have never been to Barcelona, and I think it will be like most other European cities.Unfortunately, I was wrong.Nine is the first restaurant I experienced in Barcelona.The food is delicious.The service is very special.They can provide accommodation for six people on Saturday night, just call 4 hours in advance.highly recommended.We should take more photos, but we have eaten everything.More

Review original: 食物非常棒。服务很好。我唯一能扣分的是服务人员的专注，但这在西班牙似乎是相当标准的服务。食物的选择和菜肴都非常出色。很美味而且摆盘很棒。这是5大最受欢迎的地点。我会满怀喜悦再回来的!谢谢你们！更多
Translated Review: The food is great.The service was excellent.The only thing I can deduct is the concentration of service staff, but this seems to be a very standard service in Spain.The choice of food and dishes are excellent.Very delicious and great.This is the most popular place for the 5th National Congress.I will come back with joy again! Thank you!More

Review original: 我在这里享用的食物让我感到惊喜！本地的、时令的，新鲜的，是由老板自己用爱准备的！他们提供固定的菜单，对于他们提供的产品和服务的质量而言价格实惠！等不及要再去了!更多
Translated Review: The food I enjoyed here surprised me!Local, seasons, fresh ones are prepared by the boss with love!They provide a fixed menu, which is affordable for the quality of the products and services they provides!Can't wait to go again! More

Review original: 我们在这里吃饭，对餐厅提供的一切都很满意，食物非常美味，摆盘得也很漂亮，工作人员，包括在我们桌子旁停下的老板和厨师，都很细心，不会显得匆忙忽略我们或打扰我们。套餐的价格很实惠，有你想要的一切。推荐这家餐厅，如果我们再来巴塞罗那，我们还会来这里的。更多
Translated Review: We eat here, we are very satisfied with everything provided by the restaurant, the food is very delicious, the plate is also very beautiful, and the staff, including the bosses and chefs parked next to our table, are very careful and will not seem to ignore us in a hurry.Or disturb us.The price of the package is very affordable, with everything you want.Recommend this restaurant, if we come to Barcelona again, we will come here.More

Review original: 我们刚刚离开9Nine，这家餐厅的菜太好吃了。我们吃了里脊肉，这是我们吃过最棒的里脊肉。同时我们还吃了牛排，非常嫩，很美味。我们吃了芝士蛋糕作为甜点，超级赞。很高兴我们决定在这用餐，记得一定要提前预订。我们是晚上八点来的，几乎所有的桌子上都有一个“已预订”的标志。如果你在巴塞罗那的话，我推荐这个餐厅给你！更多
Translated Review: We just left 9NINE, and the food in this restaurant was too delicious.We ate the lipsticks. This is the best lip meat we have ever eaten.At the same time, we also ate steak, very tender and delicious.We ate cheese cake as desserts, super praised.I am glad that we decided to eat here, remember to book in advance.We came at 8 pm, and almost all the tables had a "reservation" sign.If you are in Barcelona, I recommend this restaurant for you!More

Review original: 这家店靠近我住的酒店，也许是因为年末了，餐厅晚上8点半满客了，他们建议我9点半再来，但是等到了10点才有位置。整个就餐体验很棒，环境和氛围一流，员工态度友善，有求必应。菜品都很好吃，分量足。套餐有三道小吃、一道主菜、一份甜品和咖啡，还会赠送一杯Cava起泡酒。强烈推荐这家店，也建议提前预订。最后消费大概37欧元。更多
Translated Review: This shop is close to the hotel I live in. Perhaps because of the end of the year, the restaurant is full at 8:30 in the evening. They suggested that I come again at 9:30, but wait until 10 o'clock.The whole dining experience is great, the environment and atmosphere are first -rate, the employee attitude is friendly, and it must be responsive.The dishes are delicious and sufficient.The package includes three snacks, a main course, a dessert and coffee, and a cup of Cava sparkling wine.It is highly recommended for this store, and it is also recommended to book in advance.Finally, consumption is about 37 euros.More

Review original: 这是一家运营非常好的餐厅，提供多种选择，价格合理。 令人愉快的氛围和超好的音响效果。 尽管每张桌子都坐满了，但仍然可以和同一个桌子的同伴交谈。 很高兴会再来。更多
Translated Review: This is a very good restaurant that provides a variety of options and reasonable prices.A pleasant atmosphere and super good audio effect.Although each table is full, they can still talk to their peers at the same table.I am glad to come again.More

Review original: 在七天的旅行后，这是我们在这最后一顿晚餐。餐馆空间的设计，食物的质量，服务等都很棒，如果我们自己开一家餐厅的话也会完全按照这样做的。这里的套餐菜单概念非常优秀，考虑到食物的质量，这里的定价也很公道。毫无疑问，五星好评。更多
Translated Review: After a seven -day trip, this was our last dinner.The design of the restaurant space, the quality of food, and services are great. If we open a restaurant ourselves, we will do it completely.The concept of the set menu here is very good. Considering the quality of food, the pricing here is also fair.There is no doubt that five -star praise.More

Review original: 我们一群游客在这里吃了一顿游前晚餐，非常棒。食物很不错，服务好，价格也合适。事实上，这算得上是我这辈子吃过的最好吃的晚餐之一！我强烈推荐这家餐厅，你一定会满意的。更多
Translated Review: A group of our tourists ate here for dinner before, which is great.The food is very good, the service is good, and the price is appropriate.In fact, this is one of the best dinner I have eaten in my life!I strongly recommend this restaurant, you will be satisfied.More

Review original: 我为过生日把这里的餐厅搜索了一遍。评论很好，但对餐馆没有公正评价!从头到尾的经历是完美的。食物太棒了。在我吃过的最好的牛排之前，先吃一些小吃。吃过牛排之后用一个热菜结束这次体验非常好。毫无疑问，我还会在这里吃饭的。好吃的食物，价格公道。体验是五星!更多
Translated Review: I searched the restaurant here for my birthday.The comment is very good, but there is no fair evaluation of the restaurant! The experience from beginning to end is perfect.The food is great.Before I ate the best steak, eat some snacks.After eating steak, this experience is very good after eating a hot dish.There is no doubt that I will eat here.Delicious food, fair price.Experience is five -star! More
Into

Restaurant: Tino, esto no es una pizzería
Review original: 新发现的宝藏餐厅！点外卖到家食物还很热，像刚从烤箱里拿出来。包装的设计也非常用心。一盒里面有四种不同口味，每一个口味都千差万别，又极具特色，最重要的是食材用的都特别新鲜。自制的柠檬汁也很好喝，我会推荐给我的朋友👍
Translated Review: Newly discovered treasure restaurant!The food at home is still very hot, just like it has just taken out of the oven.The design of the packaging is also very careful.There are four different flavors in a box. Each taste is very different and very distinctive. The most important thing is that the ingredients are particularly fresh.Homemade lemon juice is also very delicious, I will recommend it to my friends 👍

Restaurant: Tino, esto no es una pizzería
Review original: 在巴塞罗那这个能找到各种世界好吃的食物的地方，竟然有这种结合意大利披萨和Empanada的叫做tino的食品，外酥里柔，能感觉出食材非常新鲜，甜品也很赞。下单后很快就收到了，我们几个人都很喜欢吃，下次还会再来点其他的口味试试。
Translated Review: In Barcelona, a place that can find delicious foods in all kinds of worlds, there are even this kind of food called TINO combined with Italian pizza and Empanada. It can feel that the ingredients are very fresh and the desserts are very good.After placing an order, I received it quickly. A few of us liked to eat very much, and we will try some other flavors next time.

Review original: 地方就在附近，他们有美味的食物和优质的服务。希望很快会回来，附近没有很多优质的比萨。
Translated Review: The place is nearby, they have delicious food and high -quality services.I hope I will return soon, there are not many high -quality pizza nearby.

Review original: 真是一群可爱的人！在看外面的菜单时，主人的妻子立刻向我们致意，他们问我们是否对食物有任何疑问。我们与工作人员进行了几次热烈的对话，他们证明了他们为我们提供的正宗的意大利pina令人难忘。
Translated Review: Really a group of cute people!When watching the menu outside, the owner's wife immediately tried to us, and they asked us if we had any questions about food.We had a warm conversation with the staff, which proved that the authentic Italian PINA they provided us for us was unforgettable.

Review original: 店主是如此美好和快乐，披萨甚至更好，他说家庭是意大利，并建议尝试面食，但选择另一个比萨饼，因为第一个的味道。第二个突破了！试试这个地方
Translated Review: The owner is so beautiful and happy, pizza is even better. He said that the family is Italy and suggested to try pasta, but choose another Bisa cake because of the first taste.The second breakthrough!Try this place

Review original:
您收到的服务非常好，非常友好，对他的食物和饮料充满热情。
我们有一个披萨分享，这是令人难以置信的。会推荐给大家。我们会回来的
Translated Review:
The services you receive are very good, very friendly, and passionate about his food and drinks.
We have a pizza sharing, which is incredible.I will recommend it to everyone.We will come back

Review original:
Hola la comida时代muy bien。 La pizza era perfecto y el cafe es maravilloso。 Somos es grupos de siete y disfrutamos Las comida。
服务很棒，经营餐厅的夫妇非常好。

我们会再来这里
Translated Review:
Hola La Comida era Muy Bien.La Pizza Era Perfecto Y El Cafe ES Maravilloso.Somos ES GRUPOS de Siete Y Disfrutamos Las Comida.
The service is great, and the couple running the restaurant is very good.

We will come here again

Review original: 由一对可爱的意大利夫妇Alessio和Carol经营。非常友好的服务，美味的食物，尤其是比萨罗马和城里最好的意大利咖啡！他们也有很棒的啤酒选择。如果你在该地区肯定检查这个地方！
Translated Review: It is run by a cute Italian couple Alessio and Carol.Very friendly service, delicious food, especially the best Italian coffee in Bisar Rome and the city!They also have great beer choices.If you are sure to check this place in the area!

Review original: 餐厅的氛围让人感觉很放松。预定了7点开餐，我们是第一桌，老板亲切地介绍了菜单和酒，白葡萄酒的选择让人对菜品有了更高的期待。果然，随后的每一道菜都充满了惊艳，美食带给人的兴奋感持续了整个用餐过程。这是我们第四次来到巴塞罗那，但却是第一次体验到巴塞罗那美食的精致感。现在已经迫不及待开始期待下一次去巴塞罗那了！
Translated Review: The atmosphere of the restaurant makes people feel very relaxed.After booking at 7 o'clock, we were the first table. The boss introduced the menu and wine cordially. The choice of white wine made people look forward to the dishes.Sure enough, every dish was full of stunning, and the excitement brought by the food continued the entire dining process.This is the fourth time we have come to Barcelona, but it is the first time that I experienced Barcelona's delicateness.I can't wait to start going to Barcelona next time!
Into

Review original: 我们在这家餐馆的配对菜单上点了食物。食物的味道真是太棒了！我们一行共有4对夫妇，他们还为素食者提供了美味的替代品。从开胃菜到甜点，我们点的食物被精美地摆放在独特的盘子里，这增加了我们用餐的感觉。即使我们的餐桌旁坐了8个人，在这家餐馆也令我们感到很亲密。何塞和塞布丽娜对每道菜的介绍和展示是我们晚上用餐最精彩的部分。如果你想寻找一个完美的夜晚，这家餐馆就是你要去的地方！更多
Translated Review: We ordered food on the pairing menu of this restaurant.The taste of food is really great!We have a total of 4 couples, and they also provide delicious alternatives for vegetarians.From appetizing dishes to desserts, the food we ordered was placed on a unique plate, which increased the feeling of our meals.Even if there are 8 people sitting next to our table, we feel very close in this restaurant.The introduction and display of each dish for each dish is the most exciting part of our dining at night.If you want to find a perfect night, this restaurant is where you are going!More

Review original: 我们非常享受在康格拉西亚的这段经历。我们点了这里的“惊喜”品尝菜单，每一道菜都很美味。而且更棒的是，这里的酒也很好，服务也很有用心和专业。我们强烈推荐这家店，我们肯定还会再来的。
Translated Review: We enjoy this experience in Congracia.We ordered the "surprise" to taste the menu here, and each dish was delicious.And even better, the wine here is also very good, the service is also very intentional and professional.We strongly recommend this shop, we will definitely come again.

Review original: 我喜欢巴塞罗那，并且有幸在过去的三年里的7月份参观了这座城市，这家餐厅在我们的访问时始终是必做之事。独特的食物，葡萄酒和服务。大爱这里。极力推荐！更多
Translated Review: I like Barcelona, and I am fortunate to visit the city in July in the past three years. This restaurant has always been a must -do when our visit.Unique food, wine and service.Love here.Recommended strongly!More

Review original: 这是与我们的4名DESY烹饪俱乐部成员一起度过的超级晚餐之夜。整个‘惊喜’菜单都特别棒，但葡萄酒令我们惊叹！这不是普通的葡萄酒，而是精心挑选的特殊葡萄酒，能与精致的菜肴完美匹配。我们在凌晨1时30分结束了我们的夜晚，工作人员非常细心地详细介绍了我们点的菜。若您想品尝精彩的巴尔科洛纳美食，强烈推荐这里！更多
Translated Review: This is a super dinner night with the four members of our Desy Cooking Club.The whole 'surprise' menu is particularly great, but the wine surprises us!This is not an ordinary wine, but a carefully selected special wine that can perfectly match the exquisite dishes.We ended our night at 1:30 in the morning, and the staff introduced the dishes we ordered in detail.If you want to taste the wonderful Balcolona food, it is highly recommended here!More

Review original: 更多
Translated Review: More

Review original: 我们上次去巴塞罗那旅行时在这家餐厅吃了饭，顿时爱上了这里。这次忍不住又去了一次。这家小餐馆有两个前台工作人员，他们把我们照顾得很好。我们尝试了传统套餐菜单，发现所有的菜吃起来都很有意思，味道也很好。（我们在其他地方尝试过创新菜，味道融合得不是很好）如果我们有幸再来巴塞罗那一次的话，一定会再来这家小小的宝藏餐厅的。另外，如果你喜欢辣味，试试他们的姜汁软饮，非常好喝！哦……西班牙餐厅一般会在晚上8点以后才开始晚餐。我们来自不同的时区，所以这家晚上7点就开门的餐厅正合我们的意思。
Translated Review: When we went to Barcelona last time, we had a meal in this restaurant and fell in love with it.I couldn't help but go again.There are two front desk staff in this small restaurant, which takes us well.We tried the traditional set menu and found that all the dishes were interesting and the taste was good.(We have tried innovative dishes elsewhere elsewhere, and the taste is not very good.) If we are fortunate to come to Barcelona once again, we will definitely come to this small treasure restaurant.In addition, if you like spicy flavor, try their ginger juice soft drink, it is very delicious!Oh ... Spanish restaurants usually start dinner after 8 pm.We come from different time zones, so the restaurant that opened the door at 7 pm is what we mean.

Review original: 距离我们上次去Con Gracia已经三年了，我希望接下来的三年内我还会来这里。何塞和塞布丽娜非常棒-他们热情欢迎我们，而且知识渊博，健谈，慷慨，经营一个很棒的餐厅。食物和葡萄酒都是一流的，她们会给我们介绍细节。我们又一次体验了盲品菜单，每一个方面都是一种享受。来吧，随遇而安
Translated Review: It has been three years since we went to CON Gracia last time. I hope I will come here in the next three years.Hese and Cybrina are great-they welcomes us enthusiastically, and they are knowledgeable, talkative, generous, and operate a great restaurant.Food and wine are first -class, and they will introduce us details.We once again experienced the blind menu, each aspect is a kind of enjoyment.Come on, follow the encounter

Review original: Con Gracia餐厅给人一种独特的用餐经历，由主厨来决定菜单。每道菜都是精心制作的，既好看又好吃。我们没有像6年前在那儿吃饭时一样感到失望——它仍像我们记忆中那样令人难忘！服务也非常完美——这有助于提升整体的愉快用餐体验。
Translated Review: The Con Gracia restaurant gives a unique dining experience, and the chef decides the menu.Each dish is carefully made, both beautiful and delicious.We were not as disappointed as when eating there 6 years -it is still as memorable as we remember!The service is also perfect -this helps improve the overall pleasant dining experience.

Review original: 餐厅很吸引人，很现代。我们刚一进门，服务就很到位，而且很友好。他们拿走了我们的外套，让我们马上入座。给我们递来饮料单和菜单。我们选择了葡萄酒搭配的体验菜单。我们的菜上得很快，选的酒和食物搭配得很好。两位服务员都非常友好和专业，对每道菜和相应的葡萄酒都有很好的介绍。菜的一个亮点是加入了口感清新、独特的可食用花，为我们提供了多维的味觉享受。总的来说，这是一次令人难以置信的体验，食物美味，服务周到。
Translated Review: The restaurant is very attractive and modern.As soon as we entered the door, the service was in place and very friendly.They took our coat and let us take the seat immediately.Give us a drink list and menu.We chose the experience menu with wine.Our dishes are very fast, and the selected wine and food are well matched.The two waiters are very friendly and professional, and they have a good introduction to each dish and corresponding wine.One of the highlights of the dish is that the fresh and unique edible flowers are added to provide us with a multi -dimensional taste enjoyment.In general, this is an incredible experience, delicious food and thoughtful service.

Review original: 食物超棒，两位主人的服务也十分周到。我们是盲选的，由主厨决定菜单，另外还加了红酒，跟食物非常相配。菜都非常好吃，每道菜都有详细的解释，好让我们知道吃/喝的是什么。之前试过尝鲜菜单，但还从来没有试过盲选，还真没让我们失望。美味的食物、暖心的老板、精心的准备，给人十分独特之感，让人觉得备受欢迎。最棒的要数鳕鱼肉了，文火烤猪肉、薄荷和电花甜点也超棒。如果在巴塞罗那的话千万不要错过。一定要先预定，因为这里真的挺小的（大概只有24个座位）。
Translated Review: The food is great, and the service of the two owners is also very thoughtful.We were blindly selected. The chef decided the menu, and red wine was added, which was very matched with food.The dishes are very delicious, and each dish has a detailed explanation, so that we can know what to eat/drink.I tried the early adopters before, but I never tried blind selection, and I really didn't let us down.The delicious food, the warm -hearted boss, and the careful preparations give people a very unique sense and make people feel very popular.The best is the cod meat, and the roasted pork, mint and electroext desserts are also great.Don't miss it if you are in Barcelona.Be sure to book it first, because it is really small here (about only 24 seats).

Review original: 我们尝试了“体验”菜单，真是太棒了。 真的很好。 “电花”是亮点之一（我不会说更多去破坏你的体验:)。 服务员真的很有趣，让你有宾至如归的感觉。
Translated Review: We tried the "experience" menu, which was great.really good."Electric" is one of the highlights (I won't say more to destroy your experience :).The waiter is really interesting, so that you feel like a guest.

Review original: 我在这家特别的餐馆有一次很棒的晚餐体验。这里有两个店主，他们两个人对自己的工作都非常有热情，能让你在这家餐馆有很棒的体验。他们一开始就会给你讲解每一道菜的细节，这也是为什么这里的每一道菜色香味俱全，而且所有的食物食材都是很高级的。你一定要来这家餐馆试试。
Translated Review: I have a great dinner experience in this special restaurant.There are two shopkeepers here. The two of them are very enthusiastic about their work, allowing you to have a great experience in this restaurant.From the beginning, they will explain the details of each dish. This is why every dish here is full of fragrance, and all food ingredients are very advanced.You must come to this restaurant to try.

Review original: 我们在这里度过了美好的夜晚。那里有2个菜单：一个传统的，一个惊喜的（厨师根据喜好或过敏情况选择菜单）。我们选了惊喜菜单，是一个非常好的选择。一切都很美味，工作人员非常好。他们解释了一切都是如何准备的，他们专业而且富有幽默感。非常感谢！我们吃到了一顿很棒的晚餐。
Translated Review: We have a good night here.There are two menus there: a traditional, a surprise (the chef chooses the menu according to preferences or allergies).We chose the surprise menu, which is a very good choice.Everything is delicious and the staff is very good.They explained how everything was prepared, and they were professional and humorous.Thank you so much!We had a great dinner.

Review original: 在猫途鹰上看了大家对这间餐厅的评价后过来的，并没有让我们失望。这是间很舒适的餐厅，气氛很好，食物超级美味。尝试了品尝菜单，每道菜都很棒，餐桌服务也是一流的，所有工作人员都很热情温暖。这是间不可错过的餐厅!!
Translated Review: After watching the evaluation of this restaurant on the Cathawk, we did not disappoint us.This is a very comfortable restaurant. The atmosphere is very good and the food is super delicious.I tried to taste the menu. Each dish was great, and the table service was first -class. All staff were very enthusiastic and warm.This is a restaurant that must be missed !!

Review original: Sabrina和Jose真的很努力为我们带来了非常美好的体验。餐馆很小，可能只有10/12张餐桌，所以感觉很亲密，但间隔不是很近。我们选择传统品尝菜单，并且点了一瓶很不错的葡萄酒。这顿饭花了三个小时，所以做好准备，但真的很好。我不喜欢给食物拍照片，但这一次我不得不这么做。总的来说，这是一次美好的用餐体验。用餐中，我的妻子问是否有什么可以让我们记下每道菜。Sabrina将所有细节亲手记录在了他们的一份菜单上面！
Translated Review: Sabrina and Jose really worked hard to bring us a very beautiful experience.The restaurant is very small, maybe only 10/12 tables, so it feels very close, but the interval is not very close.We chose the traditional tasting menu and ordered a bottle of good wine.This meal took three hours, so I was ready, but it was really good.I don't like to take pictures of food, but this time I have to do so.In general, this is a good dining experience.During the meal, my wife asked if there was anything to let us write down every dish.Sabrina recorded all the details on one of their menus!

Review original: 我和我的丈夫选择了葡萄酒搭配的“体验”，每道菜都让我们眼花缭乱，享受着令人惊艳的味道。这个小专业团队给我们留下了深刻的印象，这是我们在西班牙停留的完美方式。强烈推荐你来体验——你不会失望的!
Translated Review: My husband and I chose the "experience" of wine with wine. Every dish made us dazzled and enjoyed a stunning taste.This small professional team left us a deep impression, which is the perfect way we stay in Spain.I strongly recommend you to experience -you won't be disappointed!

Review original: 我们最近在巴塞罗那去了Con Gràcia餐厅。到目前为止，这里一直是我们最喜欢吃晚餐的地方之一。服务完美，友好，热情，非常了解菜单上的食物和酒。菜单本身是选择两个品尝菜单之一。一个是传统的菜式，一个是惊喜菜式。我们选择了惊喜菜式，留下了深刻的印象，很棒的口味，烹饪技术很棒，最重要的是，美味！作为一个比较，我们很幸运地在巴塞罗那去了一家米其林三星餐厅，但在任何时候我们都会在Con Garcia餐厅选择吃晚餐。
Translated Review: We recently went to the Con Gràcia restaurant in Barcelona.So far, this has always been one of our favorite places to eat dinner.The service is perfect, friendly, enthusiastic, and knows the food and wine on the menu very well.The menu itself is one of the two tasting menus.One is a traditional dish, and the other is a surprise dish.We chose a surprise dish, which was impressed by it. It was great, and the cooking skills were great. The most important thing is that it is delicious!As a comparison, we were lucky to go to a Michelin Samsung restaurant in Barcelona, but at any time we would choose dinner at the Con Garcia restaurant.

Review original: 品尝南美小吃和精心制作的鸡尾酒的绝佳去处。有很棒的比萨可供挑选。舒服、休闲的氛围。店主/经营者很友好，让我们一次又一次地回来吃点心和聊天。基尔特罗是一个很好的地方去开始或结束你的夜晚，也可以过来这里享受美味的食物。更多
Translated Review: Taste of South American snacks and elaborate cocktails.A great pizza is available.A comfortable, casual atmosphere.The owner/operator is very friendly, let us come back to eat snacks and chat again and again.Kiltro is a good place to start or end your night, and you can also come here to enjoy delicious food.More

Review original: 巴塞罗那最好的Michelada。非常好的鸡尾酒和食物。我和一些朋友一起去了Kiltro Bar，将再次回来！更多
Translated Review: Barcelona's best Michelada.Very good cocktail and food.I went to Kiltro Bar with some friends, and I will come back again!More

Review original: 该死的食物是死的。您将在这里物有所值，并得到业主弗朗西斯和他可爱的员工的超级服务。我们会一次又一次地回来。喜欢这个地方和食物。更多
Translated Review: Damn food is dead.You will be worthwhile here and get the super service of the owner Francis and his cute employees.We will come back again and again.Like this place and food.More

Review original: 伟大的皮斯科和伟大的变异。正宗的拉丁美洲氛围。如果您想品尝精美的鸡尾酒和真正的拉丁文化，一定要在Gr cia停留。更多
Translated Review: Great Pisco and great mutation.Authentic Latin America atmosphere.If you want to taste exquisite cocktails and real Latin culture, you must stay in GR CIA.More

Review original: 这里的食物很棒！他们提供传统的拉丁美洲美食。我们吃了那些炸香蕉薯片，玉米片，玉米饼，蛋糕和一些鸡尾酒，我可以推荐所有这些。工作人员也很好。下次当我在巴塞罗那时，我肯定会去哪里更多
Translated Review: The food here is great!They provide traditional Latin American food.We ate those fried banana potato chips, corn slices, corn cakes, cakes and cocktails. I can recommend all these.The staff is also very good.When I am in Barcelona next time, I will definitely go more

Review original: 招牌手工鸡尾酒，震撼人心！弗朗西斯是我们在巴塞罗那最好的调酒师，不要错过这些潮湿的饮料！更多
Translated Review: The signboard handmade cocktail is shocking!Francis is the best bartender in Barcelona, don't miss these humid drinks!More

Review original: 我们的十人小组在他们关闭之前偶然发现了这个地方。弗朗西斯（我们的调酒师）不仅张开双臂欢迎我们，而且还提供了我们生活中曾经拥有的最好的工艺和融合的鸡尾酒。这是来自两位调酒师。如果你跳过这个地方，你搞砸了。它的氛围，温暖，活力和热情好客是我们所需要的一切，而且更多。谢谢KILTRO如果我们住在这里你肯定会有一些常客？更多
Translated Review: Our ten -person group accidentally discovered this place before they closed.Francis (our bartender) not only welcomes us with open arms, but also provides the best craftsmanship and coordinating cocktails that we once had in our lives.This is from two bartender.If you skip this place, you messed up.Its atmosphere, warmth, vitality and enthusiastic hospitality are everything we need, and more.Thank you Kiltro, if we live here, you will definitely have some regular customers?More

Review original: 在访问巴塞罗那10次之后，在这个神奇的城市预订我们的婚礼之旅时，我们偶然发现了我们去过的最好的鸡尾酒吧。我有Gin Mediterraneo，这是不真实的。工作人员对所有不同的鸡尾酒都非常了解，而且友好。肯定会再次来到这里。 X更多

Review original: 和几个朋友一起去了那里。伟大的鸡尾酒（伟大的我意味着伟大的）。我们有玉米片和肉馅卷饼，它们非常好吃且很好。凉爽的氛围和氛围。如果你在附近，你应该试一试！更多
Translated Review: Go there with a few friends.Great cocktails (great I mean great).We have corn slices and meat stuffed cakes. They are very delicious and good.The cool atmosphere and atmosphere.If you are nearby, you should try it!More

在Instagram上看到一些促销和戏弄，出于好奇，决定和一些朋友去那里开放。首先要告诉你的是我们和我的朋友们都不会给我们留下深刻的印象，因为我们在不同的地方闲逛并经常旅行，但是让我告诉你，自从我们进入Resto以来，Kiltro团队一直在吹头 - 酒吧首先，我对名字感到好奇，酒吧背后的魔术师弗朗西斯为我们画上了清晰的画面，对我们来说真的很有意义。
然后我们在酒吧座位。这位先生Luis Felipe向我们推荐了一款神话般的新鲜鸡尾酒，我们立刻被迷住了。
厨师安德烈斯非常想到食物菜单，我们尝试了必须的菜肴，而不是立刻我们感到失望，即使是那里的匆忙，食物出来的速度相当快，有一个壮观的演示，没有任何妥协那味道。
伙计们对Kiltro团队大加赞赏。
大男孩在镇上。 ？更多

I saw some promotions and teasing on Instagram. Out of curiosity, I decided to go there with some friends.The first thing to tell you is that we and my friends will not impress us, because we stroll around and travel frequently in different places, but let me tell you that since we entered RESTO, the KILTRO team has beenBlowing-First, I am curious about the name. The magician behind the bar Draw Crancis draws a clear picture for us, which is really meaningful for us.

Review original:
平平无奇的夜晚聚集了四个饥饿的肉食者。
真的，太！好吃了！
服务员推荐了肉眼但是我们人比较多，就点了1kg的肉拼盘
个人感觉香肠No.1肉汁在嘴里爆开，其次是牛仔骨，太香了，血肠也很好吃，牛排烘烤的味道也无法忘记，酱汁也非常好吃！解腻还胃口大开！绿色的那个酱汁真的强推！
以后想吃肉绝对会再来，太满足了！
最后谢谢LYN~服务也超级好，推荐的辣酱也不错！

Four hungry carnivors gathered in the same night.
Really, too!It's delicious!
The waiter recommends the naked eye, but there are more people, so we ordered 1kg of meat platter
Personally feel that the sausage NO.1 gravy burst into the mouth, followed by denim bone, which is too fragrant, the blood sausage is also delicious, the taste of steak baking can not be forgotten, and the sauce is very delicious!Jieling and appetite!The green sauce is really strong!
If you want to eat meat in the future, you will definitely come again, too satisfying!
Finally, thank you Lyn ~ The service is also super good, and the recommended hot sauce is also good!

Review original: 我在巴塞罗那呆了一周，去了这家了不起的餐厅两次！食物很棒，但是还有其他更好的东西。 。 。他的名字叫Aitor，他是一个可爱的服务生，他非常有趣，并免费为我们带来了东西！ ！我们不能专心听他在说什么，因为他很烫！ ！ ！最后，我们自欺欺人，但无论如何晚上好！ PS：Aitor，如果您对这种奇怪的行为感到抱歉，我们仍然爱您并关心您！顺便说一句，我为我的牙齿之间的食物感到遗憾！反正一切都好吃

Review original: 惊人！ ！去喝一杯，但后来又住了几杯。我真的很喜欢酒吧的风格和装饰。鸡尾酒很棒，友好的酒吧老板确实让我们度过了一个愉快的夜晚。您可以看到他知道自己在做什么，并且总是问一切是否还好。他还给了我们有关不同瓶子的信息，对此我非常感谢。真的会推荐在巴塞罗那的时候更多

Review original: 美味的食物，但最重要的是服务！ ！喜欢这个地方，在巴塞罗那绝对是必须的。不是典型的西班牙小吃，它会更加详细。
Translated Review: Delicious food, but the most important thing is service!IntersectionLike this place, it is definitely necessary in Barcelona.It is not a typical Spanish snack, it will be more detailed.

Review original: 文华东方酒店的礼宾人员提出此建议，是在酒店附近选择价格更合理的选择。工作人员很友好，食物选择多种多样。质量非常好。
Translated Review: The courtesy of the Wenhua Oriental Hotel made this suggestion to choose a more reasonable choice near the hotel.The staff is very friendly and has a variety of food choices.The quality is very good.

Review original: 说食物很好，服务是轻描淡写！ ！绝对喜欢这个地方，他们用最优质的产品制成的特殊盘子使其成为我的最爱之一！晚餐或午餐后的鸡尾酒是巴塞罗那最好的鸡尾酒之一。我还必须特别提及工作人员，因为他们是出色的主持人，让您有家的感觉。 Balula敬业精神！更多
Translated Review: Say that the food is good, the service is lightly described!IntersectionI definitely like this place. The special plates made with the best products make it one of my favorite!The cocktails after dinner or lunch are one of the best cocktails in Barcelona.I also have to mention the staff in particular, because they are excellent hosts and make you feel at home.Balula's professionalism!More

Review original: Babula酒吧是一个真正隐藏的宝石！酒吧的设计注重细节。现代而时尚的室内设计结合了非常好的鸡尾酒（自己的收藏品，还有极好的经典菜肴，如踢屁股Negroni或非常好的美式菜肴）和美味的食物 - 小吃配上现代风味。例如，带有拉猪肉和松露的芝士奶酪和鳄梨酱的玉米片和其他所有菜肴一样美味。我强烈推荐这个地方 - 如果您正在寻找巴塞罗那的优质和现代体验。毫无疑问，这是值得的！谢谢Leo的热情好客！更多
Translated Review: Babula bar is a truly hidden gem!The design of the bar pays attention to details.Modern and stylish interior design combines very good cocktails (their own collections, as well as excellent classic dishes, such as kicking buttocks Negroni or very good American dishes) and delicious food -snacks with modern flavor.For example, cheese cheese cheese with pork and truffles and the corn slices of avocado sauce are as delicious as all other dishes.I strongly recommend this place -if you are looking for Barcelona's high -quality and modern experience.There is no doubt that this is worth it!Thank you Leo for your enthusiastic hospitality!More

Review original:
来到里尔克的一顿糟糕的晚餐，来这里舔我们的伤口。

凉爽的氛围和美味的饮料。迭戈太棒了。更多
Translated Review:
Come to a bad dinner in Rilke and come here to lick our wounds.

The cool atmosphere and delicious drinks.Diego is great.More

Review original: 我们在回到C Pau Claris酒店的路上打电话给现代装饰所吸引，幸运的是食物与装饰相得益彰。我们享受了一个令人愉快的晚餐，由酒吧经理Nico照顾得很好。一群看起来像公司集团的嘈杂的团体很快就从酒吧搬到了他们的桌子旁，让我们在桌子上安静了两下。如果我没有弄错的话，厨师似乎已经在食物中引入了东西味道，将切碎的胡萝卜沙拉变成了芝麻油调味品。这是在我切成薄片的金枪鱼切片之上，这是我每天都可以吃的菜。我们还有burrata奶酪，丰富而奶油，带有轻微的香醋香醋。番茄吐司不是我们所期待的，但是芥末酱的沙拉比它更能弥补。整个晚上非常愉快。更多
Translated Review: We called the modern decoration on the way back to the CP PAU Claris Hotel. Fortunately, food and decoration complement each other.We enjoyed a pleasant dinner, and the bar manager NICO took good care of it.A group of noisy groups who looked like the company group soon moved from the bar to their desk, allowing us to be quiet at the table twice.If I did not make mistakes, the chef seems to have introduced things in the food, turning the chopped carrot salad into sesame oil condiments.This is the tuna cut into a piece of tuna, which is a dish I can eat every day.We also have Burrata cheese, rich and creamy, with a slight vinegar vinegar.Tomato toast is not what we expect, but the salad of mustard sauce can make up better than it.It was very happy all night.More

Review original: 我们碰巧经过Babula酒吧，然后回到酒店。在大气和装饰的氛围中，我们被Neko难以置信的饮料，服务和友善所震撼。 。 。如果您喜欢调酒和特殊饮品，强烈推荐。更多
Translated Review: We happened to pass the Babula bar and then returned to the hotel.In the atmosphere of atmosphere and decoration, we are shocked by NEKO's incredible drinks, services and friendship.EssenceEssenceIf you like bartending and special drinks, it is highly recommended.More

Review original: 我们碰巧偶然通过Babula，同时入住Passaig de Gracia，并享受有趣的装饰和舒适的氛围。芥末酱和腌三文鱼的绿色沙拉很美味，我们很享受女主人推荐的熏陶三明治！主人是迷人的和推荐的超级葡萄酒 - 所有这些都是合理的价格。我们在第二天过去时回来了。更多
Translated Review: We happened to be accidentally passed through Babula, at the same time, staying at Passaig de Gracia, and enjoyed interesting decoration and comfortable atmosphere.The green salads of mustard sauce and pickled salmon are delicious. We enjoy the sampled sandwich recommended by the hostess!The owner is charming and recommended super wine -all these are reasonable prices.We came back the next day.More

Review original: 在一个不算悠闲的下午，造访了巷弄内的一家餐厅，点了一份西班牙炖饭，一杯啤酒，在亲切的店员教导下学习了一句西班牙语言，让我记忆深刻，如果在有机会造访巴塞隆纳，我肯定会再次造访这间让人印象美好的餐厅。
Translated Review: In a leisurely afternoon, I visited a restaurant in the alley, ordered a Spanish stew, a glass of beer. I learned a Spanish language under the teachings of a cordial clerk, so that I can remember it. If you have the opportunity to visitBarcelona, I will definitely visit this impressive restaurant again.

Review original: 真的很棒的西班牙小吃餐厅和令人愉悦的鸡尾酒，有着可爱的情调和出色的员工，强烈建议您
Translated Review: The really great Spanish snack restaurant and pleasant cocktail, have a cute atmosphere and excellent employees, strongly recommend you

Review original: 这是我们在巴塞罗那的第一个晚上，但并不令人失望。工作人员非常细心和友好。食物很快就可以送达而且很好。我们对份量感到惊讶，因此，在像我们订购太多小吃之前，我会考虑一下！
Translated Review: This is our first night in Barcelona, but it is not disappointing.The staff is very careful and friendly.Food can be delivered soon and very good.We are surprised by the amount, so I will consider it before we order too many snacks!

Review original: 我们正在寻找一个吃饭的地方，大约10点。米，我们发现这家餐厅！海鲜海鲜饭出乎我的意料！真好吃！服务也很棒。拉莎真的很友好和专心。
Translated Review: We are looking for a place to eat, about 10 o'clock.Mi, we found this restaurant!Seafood and seafood rice are unexpected!Delicious!The service is also great.Lasha is really friendly and concentrated.

Review original:
非常感谢您提供的服务和产品的质量，也感谢您给我机会吃到我一生中最好的肉酱面食。
非常感谢克里斯蒂娜（Cristina）和亚历克斯（Alex），他们在巴塞罗那制作了最好的咖啡，我会记住您一生中咖啡人的味道！ ！ ！
Translated Review:
Thank you very much for the quality of the services and products you provide, and thank you for giving me the opportunity to eat the best meat sauce noodle food in my life.
Thank you very much for Christina and Alex. They made the best coffee in Barcelona, and I will remember the taste of coffee people in your life!IntersectionIntersection

Review original: 这是一家位于Placa Catalu a和Las Ramblas附近的小餐馆。我用XXL汉堡包买了一张Groupon票。一切都很完美，食物，服务都很好，在我们免费付款后，他们甚至带来了甜点！汉堡可以更大一点，但是足够了。会再在那儿吃饭。
Translated Review: This is a small restaurant near Placa Catalu A and Las Ramblas.I bought a Groupon ticket with the XXL burger bag.Everything is perfect, the food and the service are very good. After we pay for free, they even bring desserts!Burger can be larger, but enough.Will eat there again.

Review original: 我们来这家餐厅作为一个五口之家，两次在我们居住期间，在巴塞罗那，一次吃早餐，一次一个晚上。 早餐我们吃了各种各样的东西，从全套的英式熟食早餐到糕点。 在晚上，我们吃了素食西班牙海鲜饭，都是素食主义者，肉食汉堡。 这里的服务很好，女服务员很友好，效率很高。
Translated Review: We came to this restaurant as a five -mouth home. During our lives, in our lives, in Barcelona, one breakfast at a time, one night at a time.Breakfast we ate a variety of things, from a full set of British cooked breakfast to cakes.In the evening, we ate a vegetarian Spanish seafood rice, all of which are vegetarians and meat burgers.The service here is very good, the female waiters are friendly and efficient.

Review original: 这是我们第一次在巴塞罗那的几天有待改进的食品部。 然后我们吃了晚餐，普拉多·弗洛雷斯和我们的不见了几乎每天都回去了。 这家休闲餐厅有很棒的食物，非常友好的员工，位置很方便，就在兰布拉大道上 (La Rambla) 。 我强烈推荐这家酒店。
Translated Review: This is the first time we have to be improved in Barcelona to be improved.Then we had dinner, and Prado Florez and us gone back almost every day.This casual restaurant has great food, very friendly employees, and is very convenient, just on La Rambla.I strongly recommend this hotel.

Review original:
我们来到了这家神话般的餐厅，游览巴塞罗那。 最棒的发现！
菜单上有很棒的选择，食物是极好的。 我们点了西班牙杂烩菜饭，因为它是煮熟的新鲜的有一个 30 分钟等了大概，但等待是值得的。 慷慨的分量，不错的服务，友好和高效的。 我们还会再来巴塞罗那的，亦会向未来的这家餐厅。

We came to this mythical restaurant to visit Barcelona.The best discovery!
There is a great choice on the menu, and the food is excellent.We ordered Spanish hodgepodes because it was cooked and fresh for 30 minutes, but waiting was worth it.Generous weight, good service, friendly and efficient.We will come to Barcelona again, and we will also go to the future restaurant.

Review original: 在猫途鹰上找到了这间餐馆，第一个晚上去了，他们已经完全被预订满了，所以我们预订并在第二个晚上回到这里！哇 - 谁知道有那么多种不同类型的烤宽面条！食物很棒但是是服务造就的 - 服务员叫Danilo（应该是）。他很高兴回答我们的问题/提出建议。食物分量非常慷慨，物超所值。一定会再回到这里，并告诉来巴塞罗那的所有人都来试试！
Translated Review: I found this restaurant on the Olthawk. The first night went, and they were completely reserved, so we book and return here on the second night!Wow -Who knows that there are so many types of grilled wide noodles!The food is great but it is created by the service. The waiter is called Danilo (should be).He was glad to answer our questions/to make suggestions.Food weight is very generous and worthy of money.I will definitely return here and tell everyone who come to Barcelona to try!

Review original: 我去过很多意大利餐馆，我可以说这是我迄今为止吃过最好的食物。份量很大，价格也很好，在这里工作的人也很棒。非常非常愉快的经历，每当我们想到我们的巴塞罗那之旅，这家餐馆总是我们的主要话题。我会把这个餐馆推荐给所有人！现在请在伦敦做一个特许经营！:D
Translated Review: I have been to many Italian restaurants, and I can say that this is the best food I have eaten so far.The portion is very large, the price is also good, and the people who work here are also great.Very, very pleasant experience, whenever we think of our trip to Barcelona, this restaurant is always our main topic.I will recommend this restaurant to everyone!Please do a franchise in London now!: D

Review original: 很棒的食物。很高兴我们花时间找到了这个小地方。饭店挤满了人，但服务员可以让我们坐在外面。（如果你有计划去的话，一定要预订）服务很好。俯卧我们的是漂亮的卡瓦桑格里亚。丰富的菜单。女服务员告诉了我们一些特色菜，以及他们用的配料和新鲜面食，真是太好了。烤宽面条很漂亮，而且分量也很大。松露意大利面很漂亮。是我们吃过的最好的真正的意大利菜。甜点也很棒——巧克力心布丁，入口即化！罗谢尔蛋糕真漂亮！如果你喜欢意大利菜，你一定要来这个地方！
Translated Review: Great food.I am glad that we spend time finding this small place.The hotel is crowded, but the waiter can let us sit outside.(If you have a plan, you must book it.) The service is good.Lying lying lying on our beautiful Cavangria.Rich menu.The female waiter told us some specialty dishes, as well as the ingredients and fresh pasta they used, which was really good.Baked wide noodles are very beautiful and the weight is very large.Tulu's Italian noodles are beautiful.It is the best real Italian cuisine we have ever eaten.Dessert is also great -chocolate pudding, the entrance is melted!Rosel cake is so beautiful!If you like Italian cuisine, you must come to this place!

Review original: 我们去过了巴塞罗那，到目前为止，这里是吃晚饭的最佳地方。工作人员非常出色，食物也非常棒，感谢在Bella Buon度过了一个完美的夜晚。理查德和卡门。
Translated Review: We have been to Barcelona. So far, this is the best place to eat dinner.The staff is very good and the food is great. Thank you for spending a perfect night in Bella Buon.Richard and Carmen.

Review original: 我们在猫途鹰上找到的这家BelleBuon餐馆，我们非常想吃些爽心的美食。BelleBuon餐馆让人惊叹，从新鲜的那不勒斯烤面包，到意大利肉酱宽面配自制意大利团子，当然还有自制提拉米苏。员工非常友好，餐馆挤满了人。强烈推荐给那些渴望在巴塞罗那吃到最佳意大利美食的人！
Translated Review: The Bellebuon restaurant we found on the Cathawk, we really want to eat some refreshing food.Bellebuon restaurant is amazing, from the fresh Naples grilled bread, to Italian meat sauce wide noodles with self -made Italian dumplings, of course, there are also homemade Tiramisu.Employees are very friendly and restaurants are crowded.Strongly recommend those who are eager to eat the best Italian food in Barcelona!

Review original: 我们在这家餐厅品尝了一顿很棒的意大利晚餐。我们点了一些蔬菜，还吃了一份很棒的burrata沙拉，里面有西红柿和芝麻菜……我们一行三人前往餐厅，大家品尝了蘑菇宽面条，一个人吃了烤宽面条。餐厅上菜及时，食物热气腾腾，美味可口。我们肯定会再来的!!
Translated Review: We tasted a great Italian dinner in this restaurant.We ordered some vegetables and ate a great Burrata salad with tomatoes and sesame vegetables ... The three of us went to the restaurant. Everyone tasted the wide noodles of the mushrooms and ate a baked noodles.The restaurant is timely, the food is hot and delicious, delicious and delicious.We will definitely come again !!

Review original: 我们选择来这家餐馆吃饭是因为这家餐馆的好评很多，虽然这家餐馆离我们住的地方有一点远。真的很高兴我们选择了到这边吃饭，这家店的食物和红酒，以及店里面的服务还有氛围都是特别不错的。我们非常享受在这家餐馆的就餐体验。在离开巴塞罗那之前我们一定还会再来这里吃一次的。这家店不是很大，所以你记得要提前预订。我非常推荐大家来这家店吃饭。另外，这家店的菜单上有很多蔬菜可以选择。
Translated Review: We chose to come to this restaurant for dinner because of this restaurant a lot, although this restaurant is a little far from where we live.I am really glad that we chose to eat here. The food and red wine of this shop, as well as the service in the store and the atmosphere are particularly good.We enjoy the dining experience in this restaurant very much.We will come here to eat again before leaving Barcelona.This shop is not very big, so you remember to book in advance.I highly recommend everyone to come to this shop for dinner.In addition, there are many vegetables on the menu to choose from.

Review original: 这家餐厅是圣保罗医院附近吃意大利菜的好地方。我们下午2点左右到的这里，发现那里的人很多。他们的特色菜是新鲜的意大利面，所以我们点了千层饼和宽条面，都很好。千层饼很新鲜。我们很喜欢吃。
Translated Review: This restaurant is a good place to eat Italian vegetables near St. Paul Hospital.We arrived here around 2 pm and found a lot of people there.Their specialty dishes are fresh pasta, so we ordered thousands of cakes and wide noodles.Thousand layers of cakes are fresh.We like to eat very much.

Review original: 我们很幸运地找到了这家餐馆，食物很美味，他们所有的意大利面都是自制的，沙拉很独特也很好吃。酒单上有各种价位的酒，我们品尝了各种各样的酒，我们的服务员是意大利人，知识渊博，也非常乐于助人。美味的食物，美好的体验，强烈推荐。Jay和Eddi
Translated Review: We were fortunate to find this restaurant. The food was delicious. All their pasta noodles were self -made. Salad was unique and delicious.There are various price wines on the wine list. We have tasted all kinds of wine. Our waiters are Italians, knowledgeable and very helpful.Delicious food, beautiful experience, strong recommendation.Jay and EDDI

Review original: 千层面搭配一些食材是我尝过最好吃的，让我在bellebuon餐厅享受了一顿美餐，它的披萨又大又好吃，不幸的是，没有小尺寸的提供，导致我的孩纸吃不掉的，我得吃更多。不足的是，餐厅的服务比较慢，让我们等了好一会，如果可以改进的话，这会是非常棒的
Translated Review: With some ingredients with a thousand levels, I have tasted the best food. Let me enjoy a meal at the Bellebuon restaurant. Its pizza is big and delicious. Unfortunately, there is no small size, which leads to my child's paper to eat.If you don't fall, I have to eat more.The disadvantage is that the service of the restaurant is relatively slow. Let us wait for a while. If it can be improved, this will be great

Review original: 这个地方好像把我们直接传送到了意大利。我们在附近的一家旅馆住了一个星期，经常从餐馆门口经过，（看到的次数太多）直到（最后）我们决定（去餐馆吃顿饭）试一试。我非常后悔没有早点去——虽然餐厅已经预订满了，但我们还是得到了一张桌子，只是要求我们在一小时20分钟内吃完——这已经足够了，因为服务真的很快。考虑到食物和服务的质量，这里也相当便宜(带有牛肝菌和新鲜磨碎的黑松露的意大利面条只需17欧元)。分量相当大，可以吃很饱。总体来说令人惊叹。绝对会推荐在西班牙（这个地方）的任何喜欢意大利食物的人或任何想尝试意大利美食的人（来这里）……。
Translated Review: This place seems to send us directly to Italy.We stayed in a nearby hotel for a week and often passed from the restaurant's door (too many times) until (finally) we decided to (go to the restaurant for meals) to try it.I regret not going earlier -although the restaurant has been scheduled, we still get a table, just asking us to finish eating in one hour and 20 minutes -this is enough because the service is really fast.Considering the quality of food and services, it is also quite cheap here (Italian noodles with beef liver bacteria and freshly grinded black loose are only 17 euros).The weight is quite large and you can eat it.Overallly amazing.It will definitely recommend anyone who likes Italian food in Spain (this place) or anyone who wants to try Italian food (here here) ...

Translated Review: Very great noodles are delicious and unreasonable. This type of pasta should be delicious, thoughtful and enthusiastic, the meal atmosphere is wonderful, it is recommended, amazing :)
